title: The Cabin Show
desc: Michael learns that it's actually George Sr.'s twin brother Oscar serving time in prison, not George. After getting a tip from Barry, Michael heads to Reno to find George, but that costs him a camping trip he promised his son.

title: For British Eyes Only
desc: George Sr. drops a major bombshell that he was working with a British syndicate who conned him into building the house in Iraq. Michael decides to investigate the claim by heading to the British section of Orange County, where he meets a beautiful and mysterious woman named Rita.

title: Forget Me Now
desc: George Sr. is placed under house arrest by the family's new attorney Bob Loblaw, and finds that it's not exactly a walk in the park. Michael sets up his first date with Rita, but Rita has an unfortunate encounter with the family beforehand.

title: Notapusy
desc: To prove he's a man to Rita, Michael and his nephew Steve Holt compete in the Church And State Fair's annual triathlon. George Sr. tries to scare some at-risk youth, and Tobias tries to help George Michael's girlfriend Ann to compete in the fair's "inner beauty" pageant.

title: Mr. F
desc: The family's meeting with Japanese investors backfires big time when Tobias mistakes a real government agent for a talent agent. Gob tries to connect with his father, who is controlling a Surrogate. Meanwhile, Michael has another encounter with Rita's uncle, and Maeby's romantic comedy is a total flop.

title: The Ocean Walker
desc: Michael plans to marry Rita, but that's not before her uncle Trevor intervenes, and Michael discovers Rita's handicap. When the family learns that Rita has millions of dollars, they try to speed up the wedding process.

title: Prison Break-In
desc: The family plans their annual fund raiser, and they actually have a cause this time - Tobias is ailing due to his transplanted hair plugs, which appear to be rejecting him. Lindsay uses the illness as her ticket back into high society, and Michael learns of the prison warden's true intentions with his mother after reading the warden's screenplay.

title: Making a Stand
desc: Michael is tired of his father always having Gob compete with him, so Michael gets Gob his own banana stand franchise, only to find that Gob has set it up 20 feet from the old one. After the two compete, they decide to teach their father an elaborate lesson, and Buster refuses to use his handicap to scare kids. Meanwhile, Maeby uses Lucille's surgery in a horror film.

title: S.O.B.s
desc: George Sr. suggests a last-ditch effort to save the family by holding a fund raiser to raise money to pay their legal expenses. Michael suggests to Lindsay that she take over the house work, and he sends George-Michael to an expensive boarding school. Meanwhile, Maeby has trouble with a snowboarding film and Tobias tries to be a "discipline daddy".

title: Fakin' It
desc: As the family's upcoming deposition nears, they participate in a mock trial, hosted by Judge Reinhold. Michael searches for a mysterious witness on the list, while the prosecuting attorney makes Michael an offer he cant refuse. Meanwhile, Gob practices his ventriloquism act, and Buster fakes a coma to get out of testifying.

title: Family Ties
desc: Michael's quest to locate the mysterious "N. Bluth" leads him to Nellie, a prostitute who he believes is his long-lost sister, and the woman who just might be able to clear everything up. Meanwhile, Buster's fake coma incurs the wrath of real doctors.

title: Exit Strategy
desc: Gob heads to Iraq via his participation in the USO, where he is quickly arrested and being held by the U.S. military. The prosecutors believe this is treasonous, so Michael and Buster head to Iraq to free Gob. There, they visit the house they built and discover what's really inside.

title: Development Arrested
desc: After returning home from Iraq, George Sr. is finally cleared of all charges, and Michael is relieved to be the head of a successful company for a change. The real brains behind the madness is revealed, and just as the family begins to celebrate their victory, a whole new set of problems emerge.

title: Flight of the Phoenix
desc: Michael says goodbye to the family business and starts his own. The life of the family turns upside down when their mailman Pete dies.

title: Borderline Personalities
desc: George Sr. comes up with a get-rich-quick scam after his family falls apart.

title: Indian Takers
desc: Lindsay tries to reclaim her sense of self while traveling and getting back to her political activist roots.

title: The B. Team
desc: As Michael's career as a 'Co-Producer' unfolds, he needs his family to sign off the rights to use them in his upcoming film.

title: A New Start
desc: Tobias searches for meaning after splitting with Lindsay, only to find that old habits die hard.

title: Double Crossers
desc: George Sr.'s new business hits a rough patch, and he must bribe a politician to get his scam back on track.

title: Colony Collapse
desc: Gob finds a new group of friends after his relationship falls apart and his family abandons him.

title: Red Hairing
desc: Lindsay distances herself from her family by starting a new career.

title: Smashed
desc: Tobias attempts to recover from a series of bad choices by reigniting his passion: both professionally and romantically.

title: Queen B.
desc: Lucille adjusts to her new home only to find out her children are divvying up her old one.

title: A New Attitude
desc: Gob accepts a job from his brother, but is distracted by a scheme of his own.

title: Señoritis
desc: As Maeby's life spirals out of control, she moves out on her own ending up coming into contact with her cousin, George-Michael.

title: It Gets Better
desc: George-Michael whilst trying to reconnect with his father, finds himself overwhelmed by the responsibility of running his business, Fakeblock.

title: Off the Hook
desc: Buster tries to make it on his own without his over-bearing mother, but finds it quite difficult.

title: Blockheads
desc: George-Michael moves to Sudden Valley in an idyllic secluded neighborhood, where unusually friendly and grabby men and an occasional woman live to avoid contact with children. Rebel's relationship with the two Michaels complicates.

title: Family Leave
desc: Surprises greet Michael at the penthouse and Sudden Valley. George-Michael confides in Maeby, who's trying to avoid Sudden Valley.

title: Self-Deportation
desc: For varying reasons, most of the Bluths (even Steve Holt) feel compelled to run off to Mexico. Michael tries to convince Buster to go to the police.

title: Everyone Gets Atrophy
desc: The family unites behind Lindsay's campaign, but Michael senses that something is amiss. Maeby has an idea that George-Michael likes a little too much.

title: An Old Start
desc: Gob acquires a new offer for the company with a "premium view." Michael gets a shock when he returns to a place that holds a lot of memories.

title: Sinking Feelings
desc: The Bluths receive/present their award, but it weighs on George Sr. and creates new problems. Michael and George-Michael have a deep conversation.

title: Emotional Baggage
desc: Michael attempts to bail out Buster. George-Michael finally meets the Howards, and Ron informs Michael that his plans for the movie have been changed.

title: Rom-Traum
desc: George-Michael thinks he's being lied to by Michael, who thinks he's being lied to by George Sr. Gob hires guys to help with his "closet conversation."

title: Premature Independence
desc: As the Second of July parade approaches, Sally steps up her campaign against Lindsay while the Bluths again struggle to keep their stories straight.

title: Unexpected Company
desc: Buster fails to show for his own prison release party. Michael examines company financial records. George-Michael seeks Anonymous help to deceive Rebel.

title: Taste Makers
desc: Michael jumps at a chance to spend more time with George-Michael, who seeks a clueless president for Fakeblock. Tobias relocates his makeshift family.

title: Chain Migration
desc: As George Sr. attempts to win back Lucille, Michael assembles a mold of their scheme. Meanwhile, Buster gets caught up in Tobias and Gob's business.

title: Check Mates
desc: George Sr., Lucille and Maeby give honesty a try. Good news becomes bad for George-Michael. Michael remembers there's always money ... somewhere.

title: The Untethered Sole
desc: Buster's brief appearance in a TV weather report puts the Bluths back in hot water, but Michael has a plan involving his son's definitely real company.

title: Saving for Arraignment Day
desc: As the trial kicks off, the Guilty Guys throw the family for a loop. Lucille learns surprising news about Dusty. George-Michael plots a distraction.

title: Courting Disasters
desc: George and Lucille overestimate their new lawyer's expertise in the courtroom. Two familiar faces testify, and a video sheds more light on the case.

title: The Fallout
desc: As the Bluths come together to unveil a wall, they once again discover that they deserve nothing more than to be saddled with each other forever.

title: Pilot

desc: Turkish television comedy series set in Istanbul, Leyla and Mecnun is a surreal and absurd comedy that revolves around the fictional love story between Leyla and Mecnun.

title: Clone Wars
desc: Arda's father works with a crazy professor. Together, they start cloning people.

title: Sekerpare
desc: Ismail meets a woman and he fells in love. He doesn't know what to do in this situation so he wants help from his friends.

title: Arda Kalan
desc: Iskender founds his own mafia, "Godfather" style. Set on spoiling the peace, Arda's father sends Kamil to wreak havoc in the neighborhood.

title: Benjamin
desc: Benjamin creates chaos in the neighborhood and separates Leyla and Mecun, but his vendetta is directed against the white-bearded grandpa.

title: Hoscakal
desc: Leyla decides to go to United States and Mecnun can't make her change her decision.

title: Ramadan Is Coming
desc: Leyla is in U.S.A. Mecnun is so depressed about this and he wants to bring her back with Dede's help.

title: Yozgat
desc: Aksakalli Dede is lost. Mecnun wants to find him. He discovers that Leyla is kidnapped. Benjamin makes Mecnun see weird dreams.

title: Mecnun
desc: Leyla is kidnapped and Mecnun wants to save her. He learns everything was just a game. When he learns everyone was in the game, Mecnun shoots himself in the head.

title: Beyin
desc: Mecnun is in coma. The crew enter Mecnun's subconscious in order to save him.

title: Nurten'in Yegeni
desc: Mecnun suddenly decides to marry Nurten's niece. Everyone is shocked by this decision.

title: Evlenme
desc: Mecnun suddenly changes his mind. He doesn't want to marry Nurten's niece anymore but brothers of the bride force him for marriage.

title: Uzay
desc: Aliens, who have no feelings, come to the earth to investigate about love. When they see the love between Leyla and Mecnun, they decide to kidnap them.

title: Baz Istasyonu
desc: The cell site, which Erdal has gotten, causes a big complication in the galactic system. Planets changes their places and because of that some changes happen in the world. Everyone has different personality except Leyla, Mecnun and Ismail.

title: Illuzyon Nasil Ki Bir Goz Yanilmasiysa, Ask da Bir Gonul Yanilmasidir
desc: Leyla eavesdrops a conversation of Mecnun and assumes that Mecnun doesn't want to be with her anymore.

title: Kimi Vedalarda Hoscakal Denilmez!
desc: Zeynep abandons the neighborhood and moves to a different city. Leyla has a big traffic accident.

title: Hayat, Damarlarindan Tutup Zorla Icine Ceker Insani
desc: Mecnun speaks for the first time, one year after Leyla's death. He still can't accept the truth so he travels through time with Dede in order to save her.

title: Sari Biyik
desc: Leyla's organs were donated by her family. Arda's father kidnaps all the people who has Leyla's organs. He wants to create a Leyla for Arda. Mecnun meets Sedef and Sirin.

title: Gercek Kesik
desc: Ismail sells his organs for money. Mecnun seeks the person who has Leyla's heart. Erdal Bakkal is kidnapped.

title: Erdal Bakkal ve Ciraklari
desc: Mecnun gets close with Sedef and Sirin. Iskender, Ismail and Yavuz start working in Erdal Bakkal as pupils.

title: Hayal Kirikliklari Muzesi
desc: Mecnun is about to marry Sirin. There are two different Dede. Everyone has a big disappointment.

title: Askin Formulu
desc: There are six unsolved math problems in the world. There is one million dollar reward for each problem. Everyone tries to solve these problems. Mecnun also tries to find the formula of love.

title: Marduk
desc: A big meteor, which name is Marduk, is about collide with the world. The Maya calendar reaches its last date. Everyone assumes that this is the end of the world. Mecnun and his friends try to stop the world from ending.

title: Sir
desc: Mecnun finds the truth about Sedef's father. Sirin sees Aksakalli Dede in her dream and she wants to find out if Aksakalli Dede is real.

title: Hosgeldin 2013
desc: Mecnun seeks to find the flower of fairy tales. There is a big new year party at Mecnun's house.

title: Masal Cicegi
desc: Mecnun loves Sirin and Sedef loves Mecnun. No one knows what to do about this situation.

title: Yavuz Nasil Kurtulur?
desc: Yavuz gets caught during a robbery and goes to jail. The crew make a plan to save him from the jail.

title: Okul Yolunda
desc: Sedef tells Mecnun that she loves him. Erdal tells the story of how he met Nurten.

title: Ismail Abi
desc: Mecnun and Ismail have an argument. Ismail feels sorry and abandons the neighborhood. No one can find Ismail.

title: Mecnun'luk Istidadi
desc: The flower of fairy tales dries. Mecnun tries to save it.

title: Talih Kusu
desc: Iskender goes to jail. Everyone is frustrated about this situation. The crew make a plan to rescue Iskender while he is threatened in the jail.

title: Made in Metonya
desc: Mecnun learns that Sedef's old name was Leyla. Yavuz falls in love. Metin has founded a state, which is called Metonya. He gives a big reward for people who want to be a citizen of his country. Erdal goes to Metonya.

title: Ardadan
desc: Mecnun still can't forget Leyla. Arda's father founds a new company called Ardadan. He wants to sell people all the products of the company.

title: Tarihler Arasi Yolculuk
desc: Mecnun finds a supernatural door in Metonya. When he passes through the door, he travels through time. He goes to a different year, each time he passes the door.

title: Maske
desc: Sedef meets a new guy. The guy helps everybody and everyone loves him. Mecnun is jealous for Sedef.

title: Who I am?
desc: Mecnun tries to know himself better. Yavuz learns that Eylul doesn't love him.

title: Metaforya
desc: Sevim is kidnapped by the king of Metaforya. Metin wants to save his wife with the crew's help.

title: Paralel Evren
desc: Somehow, Mecnun travels through parallel universes. He sees a different life of himself in each one.

title: Baba Olmak
desc: Nurten is pregnant. Erdal has fears about being a father.

title: Drakulluk Edene Yaziklar Olsun
desc: Dracula comes to Kirecburnu. Everyone turns into a vampire but Mecnun and Iskender. Mecnun wants to end this madness.

title: Hayalet Avcilari
desc: There are some ghosts in the neighborhood. The crew tries to hunt them. Mecnun has to make a decision between Sedef and Sirin.

title: Mecnun Harikalar Diyarinda
desc: Everyone turns into a character from different fairy tales. Mecnun wants to find his princess.

title: Bela
desc: There are a lot of problems the crew needs to deal.

title: Ama Babacigim
desc: Eylul's father is about to die but Eylul doesn't believe him. She thinks that he lies like always. Yavuz, Mecnun, Ismail and Iskender start working at the house of Eylul's father.

title: Niyetci
desc: Sirin wants to be with Mecnun again. She and Arda's father have some bad plans. They decide to use Ismail for their plans and give him a new job.

title: Karabasan
desc: Arda's father steals Aksakalli Dede's wand. He wants to make people live in a world of nightmares. The crew tries to get the wand back.

title: Dagilis
desc: Sedef, Sirin and Eylul abandons the neighborhood. Everyone is so desperate about their relationships.

title: Donus
desc: The crew come back to Kirecburnu. Things have changed in their absence. They want to make everything like they used to be.

title: Yeni Hayat
desc: Mecnun decides to make big changes in his life. He wants to get a job and earn money.

title: Kabullenis
desc: Mecnun starts working in Omer's store. He meets Hidayet.

title: Seviyorum Be Abi!
desc: Mecnun is in depression because he thinks that Leyla loves someone else. Erdal Bakkal is angry because no one goes to his store anymore.

title: Hukuk
desc: Hidayet is in jail. Mecnun wants to save him in order to impress Leyla.

title: Vay Be
desc: Mecnun tries to get close with Leyla but he fails every time. Erdal Bakkal buys a car.

title: Her Giden Biraz Degisir
desc: Pakize comes back from Germany. No one recognizes her but Iskender.

title: Is Adami
desc: There are some misunderstandings in the neighborhood. Ismail Abi finds a new job.

title: Kelepce
desc: Leyla is sick of the troubles that Mecnun causes. She goes to court for this situation and Mecnun gets a punishment. He has to wear an electronic handcuff which gives him a shock if he is around Leyla.

title: Vicdan
desc: There is a voice that can be heard from all around the world and scientists think it comes from Istanbul. Scientists go to Istanbul in order to find out the source of the voice.

title: Zaman
desc: Mecnun wants to know Leyla better so, he travels through time in order to see her past.

title: Dilek Tasi
desc: Azsakalli Dede is about to die. The crew want to find his family but they find something else. They find a map in a wooden box which shows the place of a wish-stone.

title: Mecnun ve Is
desc: Mecnun and Ismail Abi find a new job. Yavuz meets a new thief.

title: Rusya
desc: Mecnun and Leyla are engaged but Benjamin and Hidayet have another plan.

title: Arabesk
desc: Arabesque is forbidden in the country. Benjamin and Arda's father produce a new drug and start selling it to people. This drug makes people believe in memories that never happened and give them a fake happiness.

title: Zengin Sinif
desc: Leyla and Mecnun start spending time with rich people while Yavuz is getting close with the new thief.

title: Orhanlar
desc: Leyla's company is about to bankrupt. They decide to organize a concert of Orhan Gencebay and hope to make a lot of money with this concert.

title: Kirecburnu Cakallari
desc: Erdal Bakkal creates a website for his store. The crew want to find money for Leyla's company.

title: Gecmis
desc: Erdal Bakkal has weird nightmares. Iskender and Omer are threatened by their past. Mecnun hears voices in his head.

title: Market
desc: There is a big hurricane that is coming to Istanbul. Mecnun and Leyla get stuck in a closed shop.

title: Ayrilik Korkusu
desc: Leyla and Mecnun have nightmares for breaking up with each other. Yavuz discovers something about his past.

title: Efsaneler
desc: Hidayet kidnaps Leyla to a magical place where it can be traveled both to a place and through time by mirrors. Mecnun thinks he can save her with the mirror of King Arthur and he starts searching it.

title: Ölüm
desc: The Death comes to Kirecburnu and he wants to take someone's life before he leaves. The crew have to choose who will die.

title: Nigde
desc: Leyla and Omer move to Nigde. Mecnun wants to find her address but he can't. Finally, he decides to make spiritual journey in order to find her.

title: Melül'ün Yolu
desc: Melul suddenly dies and everyone thinks that this is a murder. The crew try to find the murderer.

title: I. Metonya meydan muharebesi
desc: Metin stays in Iskender's house and he makes problems for everyone. He doesn't let anyone sleep in the nights and he drinks a lot. Iskender wants to get Metonya back in order to get rid of Metin.

title: Yavuz'un Vedasi
desc: Yavuz gets shot by an arrow. He is in coma. The crew look for someone who can save him.

title: Dosto Asik Olursa
desc: Dosto goes out every night. He doesn't write anymore. He meets a woman in a pub and feels in love. The tree on Omer's head grows.

title: Yoklugunda
desc: Mecnun forgets Leyla's birthday. He wants to find a meaningful present for his apology.

title: Makine
desc: Erdal Bakkal finds a machine under his house. This machine says that the end of the world is coming and the crew only have twenty four hours to stop it.

title: Gelecek
desc: Leyla and Mecnun find themselves in 4000 after the machine explodes. The crew travel to future in order to find them but they go to wrong year. They are in 3000. In both years, there is a man called the shadow who controls the world.

title: Anne
desc: Iskender has a heart attack. Mecnun starts driving taxi instead of his dad. He meets a mysterious old woman.

title: Sans
desc: Hidayet's mother and Hidayet start living together. There is a girl in the neighborhood and she doesn't speak at all. She just smiles and brings luck to person she is smiling to.

title: Fedakarlik
desc: Iskender loses his house because of his debts. They can't find anywhere to stay so they go to a park. Erdal Bakkal steals Dosto's laptop. Hidayet's mother try to know Leyla better.

title: Seviyorsan Üzme, Sevmiyorsan Oynama
desc: Erdal, Yavuz and Metin are in madhouse. They escape from there and start rebellion against sanity and its supporters. Leyla finds a job but she gets fired because of Mecnun. Iskender is sick and tired of troubles Mecnun makes for Leyla.

title: Kill Bilal
desc: Mecnun breaks up with Leyla and he wants to find a new girlfriend in order to forget her. Erdal Bakkal continues his rebellion against sanity. Hidayet's mother chases a man called Bilal.

title: Tom Waits
desc: Hidayet is in coma. The doctor tries everything to save him. Leyla makes a big deal with a company. If she can organize a concert of Tom Waits, she will get lots of money and this means she can save her own company.

title: Kahramanlik
desc: Mecnun thinks that Leyla woos Hidayet because everyone believes Hidayet is a hero. Mecnun wants to prove that he is hero too and he saved the world before. Arda's father has some bad plans to take control of the world.

title: Kireçburnu'nun 100. Kurtulus Yili
desc: Hidayet is in coma again. The doctor needs papers from a century ago to heal Hidayet. Menun travels back in time in order to get these papers from the doctor's grandfather before he destroys them.

title: Para Kazanmak
desc: Mecnun thinks that nobody respects him. He talks about this situation with Metin and he decides to get a job and listen Metin's advice. Suna is chased by her past.

title: Falci
desc: Leyla and Mecnun have some concerns about the future of their relationship. They want to know if they will still be together in the future. They travel to future separately to find the answer. Leyla is shocked by what she saw.

title: Giden Döner mi?
desc: Leyla and Mecnun decide to go to another place to make a new start. Yavuz and Eylul are getting married. Gotik Leyla meets someone. A surprise is on the way for Erdal Bakkal.

title: Bir Hikayeyi Sonlandirmak, Bir Hikayeyi Baslatmaktan Daha Zordur
desc: We take a look at the times right after Leyla's death. Mecnun doesn't speak at all. Yavuz tries to hold on to life in the jail. Erdal Bakkal makes plans for a short vacation with his family.

title: Yeniden
desc: Iskender takes Mecnun who has been unconscious for 8 years to the hospital. Just before the diagnosis, White Bearded Grandpa shows up to aid Mecnun.

title: Unutulan Bir Daha Hatirlanmaz
desc: After Leyla and Mecnun meet, Mecnun opens his eyes in a new desert; The White Room. Now he has one target ahead. He is going to stop Berk from marrying his fiance Leyla and keep their (Mecnun and Iskender's) house for themselves.

title: Tarihin Arka Kapisi
desc: Breaking the unique Chinese vase, which has only 17 more of them, Mecnun now will go to China in 16th century to find and bring one.

title: Gonul Isleri
desc: Leyla got the house from Mecnun and now Mecnun, Iskender and White Beard Grandpa start living in a tent. Mecnun goes through a dilemma and something unexpected happens.

title: Kotuluk Yolu
desc: Leyla in the White Room is kidnapped by Incubus. Leyla on Earth gets Mecnun's tent demolished. Mecnun, accompanied by a big gang, heads for the source of the evil.

title: Deliler
desc: Mecnun helps Leyla organize an exhibition at the mental hospital. Iskender, Erdal and Yavuz also fell into a mental hospital for various reasons; the team gathers in the mental hospital.

title: Yalan Dolan
desc: While trying to learn about Leyla past, Mecnun is trapped by Leyla and finds himself in a situation he does not want.

title: Her Insan Bir Alemdir
desc: The team embarks on an adventure together to bring out the good in Leyla. Thanks to Kaan, Erdal gets success and money, but this time Iskender steps in.

title: Enerji
desc: After Leyla was rescued, her good and bad sides were separated. With this encounter, Maraz is born and disrupts the order of the world. While Mecnun is in love with Good Leyla, Bad Leyla makes everyone's life miserable.

title: Yeni Baslangiclar
desc: Just as Mecnun was hopeful that he would have a future with Leyla but he learned that he had decided to marry Berk. He tries to prevent this marriage.

title: Ama Evlisin
desc: After Leyla got married, Mecnun gets married, too. The neighborhood folk wants to find out a thing or two about Mecnun's marriage.

title: Hayat Agaci
desc: Leyla and Mecnun experience a confrontation and they take a decision. Yavuz has a task that concerns the entire neighborhood.

title: Ne Sen Leylasin Ne De Ben Mecnun
desc:

title: It's About Time
desc: When Mark Grayson finally inherits powers from his superhero father, it's a dream come true. But there's more to being a hero than just choosing a name and costume.

title: Here Goes Nothing
desc: With his father out of action, Mark struggles to defend the city against an interdimensional invasion, joining forces with a team of teenage superheroes.

title: Who You Calling Ugly?
desc: Mark has to cut a study date short to help save Mount Rushmore from a crazed scientist. Robot deals with Action - Comic as he assembles a new team of world-saving superheroes.

title: Neil Armstrong, Eat Your Heart Out
desc: It's two firsts for Mark: a first date and a first trip to another planet. At the same time, Nolan and Debbie revisit their own first vacation together.

title: That Actually Hurt
desc: Feeling confident in his new abilities, Mark risks a team-up with a local villain to take down a crime lord, while simultaneously juggling school and a new relationship.

title: You Look Kinda Dead
desc: Mark joins William and Amber on a campus visit to Upstate University, hoping to discover a new future for himself. Debbie makes her own disturbing discovery.

title: We Need to Talk
desc: Feeling lost and confused, Mark looks for advice from Eve. At the same time, everyone's looking for him.

title: Where I Really Come From
desc: Mark must prove he's become the hero he's always wanted to be by stopping an unstoppable force.

title: Episode #2.1

title: The Routine
desc: In the 'Emerald City' experimental unit of Oswald State Penitentiary, we meet some of the diverse inmates who exist in a pecking order of Gangbangers, Latinos, Muslims, Westies, Aryans and Wiseguys.

title: Visits, Conjugal and Otherwise
desc: With Schibetta and the prison brass in a race to uncover Ortolani's killer (for very different reasons), we see how inmates react to visits both from their wives and (in one case) family members who are also in prison.

title: God's Chillin'
desc: Friction is growing in the wake of two deaths so Said, Wiseguy leader Schibetta and Gangbanger Jefferson Keane are brought together by Warden Glynn, who tells them to keep their boys quiet or else he'll lock the prison down.

title: Capital P
desc: Governor Devlin has reinstated capital punishment in the state--and the first Oz prisoner scheduled to die is Jefferson Keane, who killed a Latino in their skirmish. Before he's executed, Keane donates a kidney to his ailing sister.

title: Straight Life
desc: The infiltration of drugs into Oz has reached scary levels, and the efforts of McManus and Glynn to find out who's smuggling backfire in a deadly way. Despite a lockdown, drugs continue to trickle in--and the blame shifts to corrupt officials.

title: To Your Health
desc: Ricardo is discovered to suffer from Alzheimer's; Beecher flips out and sends Schillinger to the hospital; mob boss Schibetta develops stomach problems thanks to some ground glass; and Said has a heart attack.

title: Plan B
desc: A recovered Said ostracizes Huseni Mershah for turning his back on him when he was dying--and orders all the Muslims to cast him out. Impressed by Said's power, Groves decides to kill Glynn in his honor, but ends up stabbing an officer by mistake.

title: A Game of Checkers
desc: After a visit with his sons, Schillinger realizes he needs to get paroled. He convinces McManus to let him return to Em City with the condition that he leaves Beecher alone. Beecher comes out of the hole hell-bent on making sure Schillinger doesn't get paroled. McManus gets wind of Wittlesey and Ross' contraband operation and orders her to shut it down. Ross makes it very clear to her that this will not happen. The Muslims meet and discuss how the riot will begin. However, two rednecks beat them to it by fighting over a game of checkers. This causes all the inmates to...

title: The Tip
desc: Season Two premiere. In the aftermath of the riot that killed six inmates and two officers, Oz is locked down, and Emerald City prisoners are sent either to solitary or gen pop. A special committee is appointed to investigate the riot.

title: Ancient Tribes
desc: Ten months after the riot, Em City is reopened. A recovered McManus creates a council of group representatives to keep order, and initiates classes to help inmates get high-school equivalency diplomas.

title: Great Men
desc: Alvarez knows who raped Glynn's daughter, but refuses to tell the warden. Wangler is making progress at school, but his cellmate, Adebisi, isn't a fan of higher education. When Hill's judge is convicted of accepting bribes, Said takes up Hill's case.

title: Losing Your Appeal
desc: Augustus Hill's appeal is denied, despite the efforts of Said, who has better luck with Poet's poems. Meanwhile, O'Reily survives his lumpectomy, and now focuses his attention on Dr. Nathan.

title: Family Bizness
desc: With their enmity at a boiling point, Adebisi poisons Schibetta--but not fatally. Now that his brother has turned himself in for murder, Glynn no longer owes Schibetta any favors.

title: Strange Bedfellows
desc: Schillinger attempts to enlist Said to get him out of jail. Recovered from being poisoned, Schibetta is brutalized by Adebisi, losing 'control' of Oz. Meanwhile, Alvarez is bumped out of the Latino power seat by Raoul Hernandez, a.k.a. El Cid.

title: Animal Farm
desc: Cyril O'Reily, Ryan's brother, is imprisoned and falls under Schillinger's control. Ryan tries to get him away into Em City, but Cyril winds up in the hole. El Cid tells Alvarez there's only way he can 'stay in the game.'

title: Escape from Oz
desc: In the Season Two finale, Wittlesey is transferred to general population and replaced by Karl Metzger, a Nazi. Mack and another Aryan try to escape through Busmalis and Rebadow's hole. Hill gets the idea of escaping Oz by hiding in a coffin.

title: The Truth and Nothing But...
desc: In the Season Three premiere, Beecher is still in the hospital after Schillinger and Keller broke his bones, Alvarez is still in solitary for blinding Rivera, Adebisi is back in the kitchen and McManus starts dating a newly arrived CO.

title: Napoleon's Boney Parts
desc: No one knows who killed Metzger. Meanwhile, McManus hires his friend Sean Murphy as a C.O. and he launches a boxing program. Hill faces a dilemma when a new inmate reveals a terrible crime. Adebisi sticks Nappa with an AIDS-infested hypodermic.

title: Legs
desc: In the boxing program, O'Reily spikes Robson's spritzer bottle before his bout with Cyril. Rebadow's mother tries to persuade him to meet his son and grandson. Meanwhile, Nappa finds out he's HIV-positive and is moved to Cell Block E.

title: Unnatural Disasters
desc: O'Reily and Keller plot to take care of Andrew. McManus is forced by prison brass to settle Howell's sexual-harassment suit. Hanlon's murder convictions get overturned and he's allowed back in the general population--where he finds new troubles.

title: U.S. Male
desc: Wangler 'finds out' his wife and her lover were murdered execution-style. Meanwhile, Poet and Pierce get burned by Hernandez, Ricardo and Guerra. Lockdown ensues, and Wangler finds himself vulnerable--and in a cell with Adebisi.

title: Cruel and Unusual Punishments
desc: With Cyril scheduled to box Pancamo, O'Reily plans to use his spray-bottle trick, but first he must deal with Cudney. Alvarez sees the photos of Rivera's gouged-out eyes and goes nuts. New roommate Nat Ginzburg offers to be Nappa's secretary.

title: Secret Identities
desc: Adebisi accuses McManus of sexually harassing Wangler. Bellinger meets with McManus and requests execution by hanging. Just one problem: she's pregnant.

title: Out o' Time
desc: Brace yourself for the explosive Season Three finale! As the new millennium approaches, things are heating up in Em City as racial tensions mount. Glynn fires Hughes, but before leaving, Hughes delivers a millennium gift to Adebisi: a gun.

title: A Cock and Balls Story
desc: Season Four premiere. The world of Oz--an experimental prison within a prison known as the Emerald City--reopens its doors with the inmates still on a 24-hour lockdown and prison officials struggling to end the hostilities.

title: Obituaries
desc: The African-American inmates point the finger at McManus for letting Em City get out of hand. After that and his recent erratic behavior, McManus gets the ax from Glynn. Mobay's cover is almost blown.

title: The Bill of Wrongs
desc: Glynn learns from Adebisi that he was given the gun by former C.O. Hughes. Morales enlists Rebadow's help in taking Hernandez's place in the drug ring run by Adebisi and Pancamo. Mobay finds himself in a dangerous position.

title: Works of Mercy
desc: Em City gets a new Unit Manager, Martin Querns, whose methods are hardly orthodox. Beecher's torment over his missing children is worsened when Schillinger presents him with an unexpected package. McManus returns to Oz in a new capacity.

title: Gray Matter
desc: As Querns implements his new course of action, the dynamics of Em City start to change, causing friction with Officer Murphy. Beecher falls deeper into depression as he wonders about the fate of his children.

title: A Word to the Wise
desc: In an effort to reduce violence, white inmates are transferred out of Em City. Said and Arif talk to Querns about the negative impact of his changes, but their efforts are in vain. Mobay gets in good with Adebisi's crew...but pays a price.

title: A Town Without Pity
desc: With things wild in Em City, O'Reily begins a surprising affair. Zabitz asks Schillinger for protection from Keller--who tries to get into the rehab program to make amends with Sister Pete. Beecher looks to get even with his children's kidnapper.

title: You Bet Your Life
desc: After Hughes' attack on Devlin, Glynn withdraws from the race. Miguel Alvarez is still on the loose. Supreme Allah receives an unwanted surprise. Hill pays big time when he tells Mobay he knows he's undercover. Meanwhile, Said does the unthinkable.

title: Medium Rare
desc: Six months have passed. Said was acquitted of Adebisi's murder on grounds of self-defense. "Up Your Ante," a game show, has joined Miss Sally in the prisoner's TV lineup. McManus and Glynn have done their best to keep the events leading up to Adebisi's death a secret. News producer Lisa Logan tours Oz in preparation for the arrival of hard-hitting reporter Jack Eldridge, who will also be spending a night with the new inmate the cameras will follow around on his first day. That man is Omar White, a jittery, homophobic addict fiending for drugs. Busmalis drives the ...

title: Conversions
desc: New inmate Burr Reading arrives, ready to take charge of the African-American drug scene. Dr. Nathan returns to Em City, and finds the biggest adjustment is dealing with her feelings for O'Reily. Tidd tries to strike up a deal with Schillinger.

title: Revenge Is Sweet
desc: Morales looks to pit the Chinese against Redding. Alvarez offers Glynn his services as an informant as a way out of solitary. Dr. Nathan announces that Em City inmates will be selected to test a trial drug that could reduce their time behind bars.

title: Cuts Like a Knife
desc: O'Reily regrets getting Cyril involved with the trial drug when it starts taking effect. Meanwhile, Giles' request for an unusual execution creates controversy and the Chinese refugees are deported...but not before plotting revenge on Morales.

title: Blizzard of '01
desc: O'Reily is in for a surprise when a visitor reveals the truth about his past, while Cyril faces trouble for his difficult behavior. Meanwhile, Morales and Redding lay out plans that could lead to all-out war in Em City.

title: Orpheus Descending
desc: McManus calls a superficial truce between Redding and Morales. Basil finally sees his wife, but Hughes ends up spoiling their happiness. Meanwhile, Cyril's latest outburst proves to be the last straw.

title: Even the Score
desc: McManus can't turn his back on White. Beecher tells the parents of the girl he killed that he's up for parole. Howell tries to blackmail O'Reily so she can get to Cyril, but he throws her for a loop--and then O'Reily is thrown himself by a secret.

title: Famous Last Words
desc: In the Season Four finale, Hill discovers where his true allegiances lie in Oz. Redding's plot to use the Colonel against Morales has an unexpected outcome. Beecher's agony about his parole hearing leads to a shocking season climax.

title: Visitation
desc: In its fifth season premiere, Oz re-opens in the wake of major renovations that had to be completed following a gas explosion.

title: Laws of Gravity
desc: McManus thinks White may reform if he spends quality time with Said; Alvarez offers Guerra a unique solution to their dispute; O'Reily's mother, Suzanne Fitzgerald, begins a community service term teaching music at Oz.

title: Dream a Little Dream of Me
desc: Brass wants to know who cut his tendon; Redding and Morales form another uneasy alliance; Rev. Cloutier's mysterious influence over his followers grows more intriguing; and Keller returns to Oz, only to be hit with an ID from an old murder charge.

title: Next Stop, Valhalla
desc: Penders, Hill and Alvarez are given a chance to train seeing-eye dogs; Martinez gives Brass a 'cocktail' he definitely didn't order; the love triangle between Beecher, McClain and Keller becomes more complicated.

title: Wheel of Fortune
desc: Robson stirs up problems between White and Said. Meanwhile, Pancamo's illness might save some work for his enemies, Schillinger makes a friendly but suspicious overture towards Beecher, and Morales seeks revenge on his sister's abusive husband.

title: Variety
desc: As Cyril's trial gets off to an inauspiciously cold start, tensions between Mukada and Kirk come to a boil. Also, a priest named Meehan lands in Oz while White and Said turn over a new leaf in their relationship.

title: Good Intentions
desc: Hill's recovery leads to renewed friction between Redding and Morales, Alvarez gets his wish as the 'Man's Best Friend' program is finished and Meehan presents some revolutionary ideas to help Cyril.

title: Impotence
desc: In the Season Five finale, Robson goes to extremes to remedy his gum dilemma, Meanwhile, McManus struggles with personal turmoil over his decision to stay at Oz and Rebadow deals with his grandson's fate.

title: Dead Man Talking
desc: In the Season Six premiere, Alvarez and Schillinger are let out of solitary and placed back in general population. Meanwhile, a mourning Rebadow's spirits get a lift when he is transferred to the library and meets the new librarian, Stella Coffo.

title: See No Evil, Hear No Evil, Smell No Evil
desc: The unexpected arrival of Mayor Loewen at Oz spurs an ironic turn involving Schillinger and Beecher. Meanwhile, Dr. Nathan discovers why solitary inmates are getting sick. A new business plan within Oz inspires Redding.

title: Sonata da Oz
desc: Tobias learns who killed his father before being released from prison. Cyril begins shock therapy while receiving an execution date. Said is allowed to start his own company.

title: A Failure to Communicate
desc: Glynn receives mixed news on the toxic-poisoning problem. Meanwhile, Rebadow's relationship with the new librarian Stella hits a snag, Keller and Beecher work out an agreement, and Robson finally gets some redemption.

title: 4giveness
desc: Arif and the others have trouble getting Augustus' book published. Tobias confesses to Chris he's started dating someone on the outside.

title: A Day in the Death...
desc: New inmate Idzik faces his enemies and requests a transfer. Meanwhile, the Loewen case grows increasingly complicated, the Muslims run into business trouble, and the inmate population comes together to support the O'Reilys.

title: Junkyard Dawgs
desc: Three new inmates arrive at Oz, one of whom is particularly close to the O'Reily clan. Meanwhile, the Keller-Beecher-Schillinger triangle gets even more pointed, and an awards banquet ends in a fateful discovery.

title: Exeunt Omnes
desc: Querns is appointed the new warden of Oz. Brass attempts to get famous for a day. Tim tries to change the mindset of Said's murderer. Cyril is finally executed. Keller brings Tobias back to Oz for good.

title: Episode #1.1
desc: Angry, pervy, outrageous and hilarious Fleabag arrives with a bang, as she spins through the city grasping at anyone and anything that might keep her head above water.

title: Episode #1.2
desc: Fleabag attempts to rekindle romantic fires to distract her from the mayhem of her life.

title: Episode #1.3
desc: Fleabag helps her inappropriate brother-in-law buy a present for Claire, who is organising her own surprise birthday party. Fleabag reconnects with a toothy friend.

title: Episode #1.4
desc: Fleabag and her sister visit a female-only silent retreat, courtesy of their father. Their enforced silence is interrupted by an unusual neighbouring weekend workshop

title: Episode #1.5
desc: On the anniversary of her mother's death, Fleabag and Claire return to their family home for the annual memorial lunch.

title: Episode #1.6
desc: Fleabag faces up to her actions and reveals what happened to her beloved friend Boo.

title: Episode #2.1
desc: Fleabag has to attend an uncomfortable family dinner to celebrate the engagement of Godmother and Dad. Fleabag is intrigued by Godmother's new Priest, but the evening ends with old tensions bubbling to the surface.

title: Episode #2.2
desc: Counselling extracts an uncomfortable truth from Fleabag, she finds herself somewhere unexpected. A chat with Claire reveals unwelcome news, Fleabag and Martin face off, Jake wonders where Claire is.

title: Episode #2.3
desc: Fleabag helps with an event at Claire's work which inevitably ends in disaster, but an introduction to Claire's colleague proves intriguing. A chance meeting with a stranger opens her eyes.

title: Episode #2.4
desc: After a day spent looking back on painful memories, Fleabag turns to The Priest for solace, but finds more trouble.

title: Episode #2.5
desc: The day after a boozy date, Fleabag helps her sister cope with a crisis, while the Priest has an announcement that shocks the family.

title: Episode #2.6
desc: As the wedding draws nearer, the relationship between Fleabag and the Priest becomes more intense - but how will it be resolved?

title: A Touch of Murder
desc: In 54 AD, elderly and lame from birth Emperor Claudius is writing his biography and the history of his family. He recalls an encounter with the Sibyl, who recognizes him from his stutter and tells him that his account will be famous in 1900 years time. Back in Rome in 24 BC, Emperor Augustus is celebrating the anniversary of the battle of Actium, when he and his frien... Read all

title: Family Affairs
desc: It is now 9 BC. Livia has poisoned Agrippa and Tiberius is being forced to divorce his wife Vipsania to marry Julia. Neither Tiberius nor Julia are happy with this arrangement and Julia also confesses to Antonia, daughter of Mark Antony and wife of Tiberius' popular brother Drusus Germanicus, that she believes Livia killed Marcellus. Drusus is all for a return to the ... Read all

title: Waiting in the Wings
desc: Whilst Tiberius in exile derives some comfort from hearing of the mysterious death of Gaius, Antonia confesses to Julia her disappointment in Claudius. She chastises his siblings Germannicus and Livilla for shunning him but still feels that he is stupid. However everybody is amazed when an eagle drops a wolf cub into Claudius's arms and an augur reader interprets this... Read all

title: What Shall We Do About Claudius?
desc: Six years have passed. Germanicus has joined Tiberius in the Germanian campaign, to avenge the Roman legion slaughtered at the Battle of the Teutoburg Forest. Claudius remains at home, researching his family history and despised for his weakness - he faints at the gladiatorial games. In the library Pollio the historian advises him to accentuate his deficiencies. That ... Read all

title: Poison Is Queen
desc: Germanicus returns from Germania in triumph and he and Claudius catch up on family news - Claudius now has a son but is not enjoying married life. He tells Germanicus what Postumus had passed onto him about Livia's murderous exploits and Germanicus in turn tells the emperor. Augustus is pleased with Claudius and apologizes to him for doubting his capabilities. As Augu... Read all

title: Some Justice
desc: Tiberius, aided by Sejanus, is proving to be a harsh ruler with only Germanicus able to keep him under control. However, whilst he is in Syria Germannicus is mysteriously poisoned. His widow Agrippina is able to rally public support due to his popularity and accuses Piso, the governor of Syria, of being the slayer. Despite claiming an alibi, Piso and his wife Plancina... Read all

title: Queen of Heaven
desc: Tiberius embarks on a series of acts of debauchery, having sex with anybody he pleases, with Caligula a willing participant. Livia is shocked and Tiberius arranges to give her a horoscope for her birthday to suggest to her that she has not long to live. Augustus's son Castor is perturbed at the free hand given Sejanus in bringing to trial anybody Tiberius feels is opp... Read all

title: Reign of Terror
desc: Sejanus divorces his wife in order to marry Livilla but Tiberius refuses permission and suggests that he marries Livilla's daughter Helen instead, which so enrages Livilla that she poisons Helen. With Tiberius spending most of his time on Capri Sejanus seems to hold absolute power in Rome and, to consolidate his position, has Agrippina and her son Nero banished and he... Read all

title: Zeus, by Jove!
desc: Tiberius summons Caligula and his cousin Gemellus to Capri, declaring them his joint successors. Soon afterwards Tiberius is smothered by Macro, on the orders of Caligula, and his death is hailed joyfully by the citizens of Rome, unaware that worse is to come. Caligula, clearly unstable, sinks into a coma and on recovering, in addition to having Gemellus executed for ... Read all

title: Hail Who?
desc: Caligula has not only made his horse a senator but has turned the palace into a brothel, selling off senators and their wives for sex. Although scared of him - and getting thrown into a river for his pains - Claudius is seemingly the only person who can put any sort of brake on the mad emperor, intervening to save mens' lives on at least two occasions, the second when... Read all

title: Fool's Luck
desc: Claudius accepts the crown and spares all the conspirators except Cassius for killing Caligula's wife and family. He also deifies Livia. Messalina, having borne him children, persuades him to let her rule alongside him and brings in senator Silanus as an aide, Silanus marrying Domitia, Messalina's mother. However Messalina attempts to seduce Silanus, leading him to tr... Read all

title: A God in Colchester
desc: Whilst Claudius is invading Britain, Messalina is challenging the prostitute Scylla to see who can take the most partners, Messalina easily winning. She also takes the young senator Silius as her lover, forcing him to divorce his wife so that she can marry him whilst sending Claudius a divorce decree when he is away. She hopes that Rome will rally with her against her... Read all

title: Old King Log
desc: AD 54: Claudius feels that Rome should return to be a Republic but nonetheless marries his niece Agripinilla and makes her son Nero co-heir with his own, teen-aged son Britannicus. Aware of a prophecy that Nero will indeed become sole emperor Claudius encourages Britannicus to flee abroad and then return to restore the Republic but the boy refuses and he is killed by ... Read all

title: The Arrival of Raditz
desc: After five years of peace, a new threat is coming for Goku and his friends, Goku's evil brother Radditz.

title: The World's Strongest Team
desc: After 5 years, Goku and his friends get together at the Kame House.

title: Gohan's Hidden Powers
desc: After the encounter with Raditz, Goku realises he doesn't stand a chance. Only with an unlikely alliance does he have a fighting shot.

title: Goku's Unusual Journey
desc: In the hands of Goku, Raditz is doing all he can to escape.

title: Gohan's Metamorphosis
desc: Gohan continues his training in the wild as the other Z warriors go to Kami's to prepare for the Saiyans.

title: Gohan Makes a Friend
desc: Gohan helps an injured dinosaur and they become friends. Goku continues his journey along snake way and the others gather at Kami's.

title: Trouble on Arlia
desc: Gohans training is starting to pay off. The Saiyans stop on a planet and wreak havoc.

title: Home for Infinite Losers
desc: Goku has fallen off snake way and meets two ogres who say they know how to get back to snake way, but he has to win a race first.

title: Princess Snake's Hospitality
desc: Goku runs along snake way and meets Princess Snake. The Z warriors begin their training at Kami's.

title: Showdown in the Past
desc: Gohan and Piccolo start their training together. The Z warriors enter the pendulum room where they fight two Saiyans in the past.

title: The End of Snake Way
desc: Goku reaches King Kai's planet. Gohan and Piccolo continue training until Gohan's tail grows back.

title: A Fight Against Gravity... Catch Bubbles!
desc: Goku is struggling to move under the gravity of King Kai's planet when King Kai shows up. Goku begins his training by trying to catch a monkey named Bubbles.

title: The Legend of the Saiyans
desc: King Kai tells Goku about his ancestors and Goku begins his second task of hitting Gregory on the head with a heavy hammer.

title: A Black Day for Planet Earth
desc: The Saiyans arrive on Earth. Master Roshi uses the Dragon Balls to resurrect Goku, but he must get to Earth fast.

title: The Battle Begins... Goku Where Are You?
desc: The Saiyans find Piccolo and Gohan then plant six Saibamen to fight for them.

title: The Saibamen Strike
desc: The gang take on the Saibamen in the fight for the planet.

title: Nappa... The Invincible?
desc: Nappa begins his assault on the Z Warriors who can't seem to stop him.

title: Tien Goes All Out!!
desc: The fight with Nappa continues as the gang continues to fall before his onslaught.

title: Time's Up!
desc: Piccolo, Gohan, and Krillin do their best to stop the Saiyans from finding the Dragon Balls. Meanwhile, Goku rushes back to Earth on the Flying Nimbus, armed with more power than ever before!

title: The Return of Goku
desc: Piccolo makes the ultimate sacrifice to save Gohan from the rampaging Saiyans. Just when all seems lost, Goku returns to Earth with an incredible new level of power and confronts the invaders.

title: Goku Strikes Back
desc: Locked in battle with the Saiyans, Goku gives Nappa a brutal demonstration of the training he received from King Kai. Broken and defeated, Nappa must now face the ferocious wrath of Vegeta!

title: Goku vs. Vegeta... a Saiyan Duel!
desc: Goku decides to take on mighty Vegeta all by himself! The two appear evenly matched, but both are hiding their true strength. The epic battle is underway - which mighty warrior will claim victory?

title: Vegeta... Saiyan Style!
desc: Vegeta and Goku continue trading brutal blows, but the action intensifies when Vegeta reveals the secret power of the Saiyans: the ability to transform into a giant, planet-destroying ape!

title: Stop Vegeta Now!
desc: As Vegeta turns into a gargantuan ape, Goku makes a terrifying revelation.

title: A New Goal... Namek!
desc: The gang mourns the loss of Yamcha, Tien, Chiaotzu, and Piccolo. With Kami gone, Earth's Dragon Balls have disappeared. Will the surviving heroes find a way to wish their fallen friends back to life?

title: The Battle Ends
desc: On the verge of victory, Vegeta is defeated and brought to death. What will be his ultimate fate?

title: Journey to Namek
desc: Bulma accidentally destroys the Saiyan spaceship! Luckily, Mr. Popo reveals the existence of another ship that may be able to reach Namek. Can they find it in time, and will the old ship still work if they do?

title: Friends or Foes?
desc: As Gohan, Krillin and Bulma travel through space to planet Namek they crash into a strange spaceship. As they encounter traps on the seemingly deserted ship it is beginning to look like they are unwelcome guests.

title: Hunt for a Dragonball
desc: After crash-landing, Krillin, Gohan, and Bulma are nursed to health by two mysterious aliens. Afterward, they begin searching for the Dragon Balls. Meanwhile, Vegeta continues his recovery, and Goku gets inpatient while at the hospital.

title: Touchdown on Namek
desc: Zaacro and Raiti explain their illusion to Krillin, Gohan and Bulma. As they struggle to escape and attempt to continue their journey to Namek, Vegeta discovers Frieza, Zarbon, and Dodoria are already collecting the Namekian Dragon Balls.

title: Who's Who?!
desc: Gohan, Krillin, and Bulma continue their search for the Dragon Balls. Meanwhile, Goku sneaks out of the hospital to train. As Vegeta finishes his recovery, Cui informs him that Frieza is already on Namek in search of the Dragon Balls.

title: Face-Off on Namek
desc: Frieza and his henchmen, Zarbon and Dodoria, gather some Dragon Balls. Cui tracks down Vegeta and is surprised by his strength. Two of Frieza's scouts attack Gohan and Krillin while Goku does mental training in the hospital.

title: The Ruthless Frieza
desc: Gohan, Krillin, and Bulma hide in a cave when they sense the energy of Frieza, Zarbon, and Dodoria. Yajirobe brings Goku Senzu beans and Goku takes the spaceship that Dr. Brief built so he can get to Namek.

title: Escape from Dodoria
desc: After Dodoria easily defeats the three Namekian warriors, Moori is forced to hand over the Dragon Ball. And when Dodoria begins to execute the remaining Namekians, Gohan intervenes. Meanwhile, Goku continues to train on his ship.

title: The Nameks Versus Frieza
desc: As Goku trains on his ship, Gohan and Krillin watch as Frieza and his henchmen Zarbon and Dodoria, interrogate a group of Namekians about their Dragon Ball, and another group of Namekian Warriors show up to stand against them.

title: A Collision Course
desc: Dr. Brief warns Goku that the side of his ship is cracked, and it is heading straight toward a star. With the help of Kaio-ken he manages to propel himself back on course. Meanwhile back on Namek, Vegeta brutally massacres an entire Namek village and takes a Dragon Ball, while Dende tells Gohan and Krillin of Namek's origins,

title: Secrets Revealed
desc: Gohan, Krillin, and Dende escape from Dodoria; Dr. Brief tells his daughter Bulma that Goku is on his way; Vegeta confronts Dodoria and learns the truth behind the destruction of his home planet.

title: Stay Away from Frieza
desc: King Kai warns Goku to stay away from Frieza. Piccolo, Yamcha, Tien, and Chiaotzu must make King Kai laugh before he will train them. Gohan, Krillin and Dende hide from Vegeta; Vegeta locates and challenges Frieza's elite henchman, Zarbon.

title: Zarbon Transformed
desc: Zarbon reveals his ferocious transformation to Vegeta; Krillin and Dende continue their journey to the eldest Namek; Goku trains under 50 times normal gravity; Tien, Yamcha, and Chiaotzu attempt to catch Bubbles as Piccolo meditates.

title: Escape from Piccolo
desc: Gohan meets orphans and helps them out, then he makes his way home.

title: Get Vegeta!
desc: Goku continues his journey as Piccolo, Yamcha, Tien, and Chiaotzu continue their training with King Kai. Vegeta is revived for interrogation but manages to escape with Frieza's Dragon Balls; Zarbon is sent to retrieve Vegeta.

title: The Eldest Namek
desc: The Eldest Namek, Guru, unlocks Krillin's hidden potential. Zarbon reports to Frieza and is told to retrieve Vegeta's battered body for interrogation. Gohan goes after the Dragon Ball that had been hidden by Vegeta.

title: A Heavy Burden
desc: Goku, still in the magnetic storm, attempts to save himself before he is crushed by the gravity; Vegeta and Zarbon fight a rematch as Krillin and Bulma watch in fear; Gohan flies back with the Dragon Ball he located.

title: Vegeta Revived
desc: Vegeta is revived and manages to steal Frieza's Dragon Balls. Zarbon is sent to capture Vegeta and retrieve the Dragon Balls. Piccolo spars with Yamcha, Tien, and Chiaotzu.

title: Immortality Denied
desc: Due to his increased strength, Vegeta is able to defeat Zarbon and takes the Dragon Ball from Krillin; the Ginyu Force is launched; Goku continues training at 100 times normal gravity; Gohan has a run-in with Vegeta.

title: Big Trouble for Bulma
desc: Vegeta ponders how to obtain the last Dragon Ball; Krillin and Gohan fly toward Guru; Bulma tries to retrieve a Dragon Ball which she loses in a lake; Goku fires Kamehameha waves at himself to build his resistance.

title: Arrival of the Ginyu Force
desc: Guru releases Gohan's potential and after sensing the Ginyu Force, Vegeta forges an alliance with Gohan and Krillin. Meanwhile, Goku finishes his training and prepares for his arrival on Namek.

title: Scramble for the Dragon Balls!
desc: Bulma tricks the soldiers who captured her and is able to reclaim the Dragon Balls; Goku trains using Kaio-Ken in 100 times normal gravity; Krillin and Gohan continue their way to Guru; Frieza gets a report the Ginyu Force is on its way.

title: Elite Fighters of the Universe... The Ginyu Force
desc: Frieza orders the Ginyu Force to capture Vegeta, reclaim the Dragon Balls, and eliminate Gohan and Krillin; Goku prepares as his ship is on its approach for Namek; Vegeta, Krillin, and Gohan are confronted by the Ginyu Force.

title: Time Tricks and Body Binds
desc: Krillin and Gohan attempt to survive against Guldo's psychic abilities and find themselves incapacitated until Vegeta intervenes; Piccolo senses that Gohan is in danger.

title: No Refuge from Recoome
desc: The battle with Guldo may be over, but the real nightmare is just beginning! Recoome, the most massive member of the Ginyu Force, is ready to fight, and even the mighty Vegeta's attacks have no effect on this monstrous foe!

title: Enter Goku
desc: Gohan struggles against Recoome; Chi-Chi worries about Gohan; Captain Ginyu delivers the Dragon Balls to Frieza, but they learn they need a password for the activation of the balls; Goku finally arrives on Namek.

title: Goku... Super Saiyan?
desc: After Goku revives Gohan, Krillin, and Vegeta with Senzu beans and gets updated on the situation, he topples Recoome with a single blow, stunning Jeice and Burter; Dr. Briefs and Chi-Chi contact Bulma.

title: Ginyu Assault
desc: When Goku proves too much for Burter and Jeice to handle on their own, Jeice retreats in search of reinforcements. Now, the real test for Goku and his newly-acquired powers is about to begin as Captain Ginyu enters the fight!

title: Incredible Force!
desc: As the battle between Goku and Captain Ginyu rages on, Gohan and Krillin steal the unguarded Dragon Balls from Frieza's ship. It's a race against time, and our heroes must unlock the power of the Dragon Balls before it's too late!

title: Frieza Approaches
desc: Goku astounds Captain Ginyu with his amazing new powers, but the Captain still has a few tricks up his sleeve! Meanwhile, Frieza arrives at the home of the Eldest Namek and begins a battle with the noble warrior, Nail!

title: Goku is Ginyu and Ginyu is Goku
desc: In an attempt to save the Elder, Nail fights a hopeless battle against the ruthless Frieza. Meanwhile, finding himself no match for Goku's superior abilities, Captain Ginyu unleashes his ultimate attack, the Body Switch Technique!

title: Calling the Eternal Dragon
desc: Armed with the Dragon Radar, Gohan and Krillin recover the seven Dragon Balls from their hiding places. But before they can summon the Eternal Dragon to make their wish, they are confronted by a powerful new enemy - Goku?!

title: Gohan, Defeat Your Dad!!
desc: After taking control of Goku's body, Captain Ginyu turns his attention to Gohan and Krillin! With Goku trapped in the Captain's broken body, it's up to Gohan to stop the rampaging Ginyu!

title: Captain Ginyu... The Frog
desc: As the bout between Captain Ginyu and Vegeta heats up, Goku summons the last of his strength and tricks his foe into reversing the Body Switch Technique. Now, Goku, Krillin, and Gohan must join forces with Vegeta for the battle with Frieza.

title: Password is Porunga
desc: Having acquired all seven Namekian Dragon Balls, Krillin and Gohan are ready to summon the dragon and make their wish. There's just one problem: they don't know the password!

title: Piccolo's Return
desc: While Vegita takes a nap, Freeza makes his way back to his spaceship to look for the Dragon Balls. Meanwhile, Gohan and Krillin has three wishes to ask.

title: The Fusion
desc: While the Earthlings confront the evil tyrant Frieza, their wish to bring Piccolo to Namek had been fulfilled. As Piccolo races towards the battle, he stumbles upon a fellow Namekian who faces near death. The wounded Namekian informs Piccolo that a fusion between the two would create newborn power in piccolo that could possibly destroy Frieza.

title: Fighting Power: One Million??
desc: Frieza reveals a dark secret from Vegeta's past, but the villain has an even more shocking secret in store for the Z-fighters! As the monster's power level rises to terrifying new heights, all hope for the universe seems lost!

title: Gohan Attacks
desc: Frieza claims his first victim, Krillin, and Gohan must summon every ounce of his strength in order to save his friend. Can the young Saiyan put a stop to Freiza's ruthless onslaught, or is he destined to become the next victim?

title: Piccolo the Super-Namek
desc: Gohan and Krillin continue their struggle against the overwhelming powers of Frieza, but as the fighting reaches its peak, a new warrior arrives on the battlefield to aid them in their efforts!

title: Déjà vu
desc: Piccolo quickly takes control of the battle with Frieza, and the putrid purple monster is shocked to learn the secret behind his opponent's powers!

title: Frieza's Second Transformation
desc: Being Piccolo's power even bigger than Frieza's power, Frieza is forced to transform himself once again, surpassing Piccolo and putting him and the others in a complicated situation. Meanwhile, Vegeta thinks in a risky proposal.

title: Another Transformation
desc: While Krillin accepts Vegeta's proposal, Frieza does his last transformation. Meanwhile, Dende has a choice.

title: Dende's Demise
desc: Gohan and friends are forced to carry on without the healing powers of the child namekian Dende after Frieza eradicates him.

title: The Renewed Goku
desc: Despite his new powers, Vegeta proves no match for Frieza! Meanwhile, Goku's time in the rejuvenation chamber is nearly complete! Can he reach the battlefield in time to save his friends?

title: The End of Vegeta
desc: With Goku recovered and on his way to the battlefield, the end of Vegeta is getting even more close.

title: The Ultimate Battle
desc: Filled with anguish and rage, Goku begins his battle with Frieza.

title: Clash of the Super Powers
desc: Goku and Frieza continue their epic battle! An underwater attack puts Goku on top until Frieza traps him in an energy ball! It's fun and games for Frieza, but the exploding ball may prove deadly for Goku!

title: Frieza's Boast
desc: Frieza vows to beat Goku without using his hands, but the mighty Saiyan soon makes the mosnter eat his words! Elsewhere, Captain Ginyu uses his Body Switch Technique on Bulma, leaving her trapped in the body of a frog!

title: Bold and Fearless
desc: Captain Ginyu returns to the battlefield in Bulma's body! Can Piccolo, Krillin, and Gohan handle this Femme Fatale? Later, Frieza powers up to fifty percent of his maximum, and Goku finds himself completely outmatched!

title: Embodiment of Fire
desc: Goku's powerful Kaio-Ken attack has no effect on Frieza, who is still only fighting with fifty-percent of his power! Just as it seems Frieza has won the battle, a dream-like vision helps Goku ascend to a higher level of power and strength!

title: Trump Card
desc: The DBZ warriors are in shock that Frieza survived the Kamehameha Attack when Goku powered up to 20 times Kaioken. Goku is exhausted and has used about 90% percent of energy while Frieza has not even warmed up yet. The angry Frieza renews his vicious attack on Goku. The others watch in fear and shame knowing that they are no match for Frieza. Goku receives a mental-vi... Read all

title: Keep the Chance Alive
desc: Goku's Last Attack on Frieza.

title: Power of the Spirit
desc: Chaos erupts on King Kai's planet as the Z-fighters battle the Ginyu Force! Back on Planet Namek, the life and death struggle between Piccolo and Frieza rages on, and Goku completes his Spirit Bomb!

title: Transformed at Last
desc: When Frieza strikes at Goku's friends, he undergoes a raging, radical transformation.

title: Explosion of Anger
desc: Now a Super Saiyan, Goku begins his fight against Frieza.

title: Namek's Destruction
desc: Finding himself no match for Goku, Frieza attacks Planet Namek! Unable to react in time, Goku is forced to watch helplessly as the fiery blast rips through Namek's core! Can anyone survive such incredible destruction?

title: A Final Attack
desc: With only minutes to go before the planet explodes, Frieza reaches his maximum power! Meanwhile, Gohan and Bulma race back to Goku's spaceship. Can Goku defeat Frieza in time to rejoin his son and fly to safety?

title: Approaching Destruction
desc: The battle between Goku and Frieza rages on! Back on Earth, the seven Dragon Balls have been restored, but with Namek's destruction imminent, can Kami and Mr. Popo summon the Eternal Dragon before it's too late?

title: Gohan Returns
desc: Frieza's victims have been wished back to life, but as they begin to rise, Goku falls - overwhelmed by Frieza's devastating assault. Sensing his father's defeat, Gohan rushes to the scene as the universe's final hope.

title: The Last Wish
desc: Guru and the people of Namek have been brought back to life, and the dragon Porunga has reappeared to grant the last of three wishes. While a newly enraged Goku resumes his onslaught against the evil Frieza, Dende races to make the final wish!

title: Duel on a Vanishing Planet
desc: Goku chooses to stay behind and finish his fight with Frieza. With Namek set to explode any second, there seems no way for Goku to defeat Frieza and escape in time! Has the Super Saiyan made the greatest mistake of his life?

title: Pathos of Frieza
desc: Time grows short for Goku as each passing second brings Namek closer to ultimate destruction. As the Super Saiyan's strength increases with every blow, it appears his epic battle with Frieza has at last reached its conclusion!

title: Frieza Defeated!!
desc: Frieza lashes out in a blind rage, launching a reckless volley of energy attacks. In the face of Goku's superior power, the evil tyrant's greatest fear has finally been realized: defeat at the hands of a Super Saiyan!

title: Mighty Blast of Rage
desc: Even after being sliced into pieces by his own energy disk, Frieza isn't ready to release his stranglehold on the universe. With what little power he has left, Frieza fires a final energy blast after Goku as he leaves the battlefield!

title: Namek's Explosion... Goku's End?
desc: Even though it looks like Goku is trapped on the exploding planet Namek, Dende has a good reason to celebrate: the Dragon Balls have the power to bring Goku back! But if that's the case, why does everyone still look so sad?

title: Goku's Alive!
desc: It is a time of joyful reunions as old friends long absent are finally wished home with the Dragon Balls! Krillin and Yamcha are brought back from the spirit world, but Porunga, the Namekian dragon, has startling news about Goku!

title: The Heavens Tremble
desc: Gohan's going fishing, Krillin's found a girlfriend, and it looks as though peace has once again returned to the Earth. But a terrible evil lurks beneath this tranquil surface: Garlic Junior has escaped from the Dead Zone!

title: Black Fog of Terror
desc: The Black Water Mist begins to infect some of the Z-Fighters.

title: Battle in Kami's Lookout
desc: As Piccolo attempts to hold off the Spice Boys and the infected Z Fighters, Gohan and Krillin race toward Kami's Lookout to retrieve the one thing capable of reversing the effects of the Black Water Mist: the Sacred Water!

title: Fight with Piccolo
desc: With Piccolo infected by the Black Water Mist and Kami trapped in a glass bottle, Garlic Jr. allows his Spice Boys to "have sport" with Earth's heroic defenders. Will Spice's energy blast finish off Krillin for good?

title: Call for Restoration
desc: Krillin, after suffering a Spice Boys beating, attempts to free Kami and Mr. Popo, but he soon falls prey to the Black Water Mist. Gohan is the only hero left who can save the Earth, but can he do it with his two best friends against him?

title: Suicidal Course
desc: Piccolo and Krillin spring their trap, revealing that they have pretended to be infected by the Black Water Mist! Enraged, Garlic Jr. transforms using the energy of the Makyo Star and warns that the Sacred Water's effectiveness will soon expire.

title: Extreme Measures
desc: Garlic Junior and his Spice Boys harness the evil power of the Makyo Star to become stronger than ever, but Gohan, Krillin, and Piccolo are ready to battle this new threat!

title: Brief Chance for Victory
desc: Blinded by rage and desperate to destroy his enemies, Garlic Junior uses his power to open up the Dead Zone! With Piccolo and Krillin out of commission, Gohan is the only one left who can stop him!

title: The World Awakens
desc: In a last ditch effort to save his friends, Gohan launches an all out assault on Garlic Junior! Meanwhile, deep within the Lookout, Kami and Mr. Popo are under siege by the Former Guardians!

title: Krillin's Proposal
desc: Even though peace has been restored on Earth, Krillin faces his toughest challenge ever: surviving a shopping trip with Maron! And it looks like she's picking out a wedding dress! Are Krillin and Maron planning to tie the knot?

title: Frieza's Counterattack
desc: Gohan's cracking the books, and his new tutor is cracking the whip! But study time is almost over, for a powerful evil is racing toward the Earth! Gohan's worst fears have come to life: Frieza has survived!

title: The Mysterious Youth
desc: The Earth faces its darkest hour as Frieza and his father King Cold rapidly approach! Without Goku to assist them, the Z-Fighters prepare to launch a desperate attack against the most powerful evil the universe has ever known!

title: Another Super Saiyan?
desc: Frieza and King Cold descend upon the Earth, but a mysterious warrior has come to thwart their diabolical plot for revenge. Does this brash young hero have what it takes to stand up to these twin titans of evil?

title: Welcome Back Goku
desc: After defeating Frieza and King Cold, the mysterious stranger announces the exact time and place of Goku's arrival on Earth. Can this young Super-Saiyan really predict the future?! Gohan and the others are determined to find out!

title: Mystery Revealed
desc: After testing Goku in combat, the mysterious stranger reveals his true identity! What does his timely arrival mean?! In a startling conversation with Goku, this powerful hero from the future tells all!

title: Goku's Special Technique
desc: The future has been written - or has it? That's what Goku and the rest of the Z-Fighters must decide as they hear Trunks' ominous warning. The Androids are coming! And they just might be bringing the end of the world with them!

title: Z Warriors Prepare
desc: Gohan learns some new tricks, Vegeta pushes himself to the breaking point, and Yamcha struggles just to keep up as everyone prepares to face the looming Android menace! But will all their preparations be enough?

title: Goku's Ordeal
desc: Chi-Chi forces Goku and Piccolo to learn how to drive.

title: The Androids Appear
desc: Three years have come and gone, and the day of reckoning has finally arrived! The Androids are here, and they're wreaking havoc on an unsuspecting city! Goku and his friends must now put their training to the test!

title: A Handy Trick
desc: Yamcha is held at the mercy of the ruthless Android 20, and Goku and the others must race to help their friend. Believing their power to be far superior, the Androids tempt Goku's rage by leveling half of the city!

title: Double Trouble for Goku
desc: The battle with the Androids begins as Goku launches an all out assault against Android 19. The Super Saiyan seems to have the fight under control, but something is about to go horribly wrong!

title: Upgrade to Super Saiyan
desc: Attacked from within by a crippling virus, Goku is helpless against the maniacal Android 19. But just when it looks like the end for Goku, Vegeta appears on the scene! And he's got a few big surprises in store for the Androids!

title: The Secret of Dr. Gero
desc: In his first fight as a Super Saiyan, Vegeta takes control of the battlefield and defeats Android 19 in convincing fashion! Unwilling to share 19's fate, Android 20 runs for cover in the mountains!

title: More Androids?!
desc: Vegeta, Piccolo, and Gohan lead an exhaustive search through the mountains for Android 20. But the hunters are also the hunted! Android 20 lurks in the shadows, ready to strike, and it looks like Piccolo is his first target!

title: Follow Dr. Gero
desc: Our heroes make a startling discovery: Android 20 is none other than Dr. Gero himself! Before they can act on this new knowledge, the diabolical doctor flees to his secret laboratory, where he intends to awaken more killer androids!

title: Nightmare Comes True
desc: The race is on, as the Z-Fighters search frantically for Dr. Gero's hidden laboratory. But rather than stop the Androids before they're activated, Vegeta wants a challenge. Despite Trunks' warning, he's chooses to fight the Androids alone.

title: Goku's Assassin
desc: Dr. Gero escapes to his mountain hideout and brings his killer androids to life. Without the help of Goku, all hope seems lost. Dr. Gero appears one step closer to ultimate vengeance, but his evil creations have a vendetta of their own!

title: Deadly Beauty
desc: Vegeta takes on Android 18, but finds himself seriously outmatched.

title: No Match for the Androids
desc: The Z-Fighters are totally decimated by the androids.

title: Last Ditch Effort
desc: Vegeta, Trunks, Tien, and Piccolo realize a grim truth: unless they can increase their powers quickly, they'll have no chance against the androids. In a drastic move, Piccolo flies to Kami's Lookout and makes a most unexpected proposal!

title: Closing In
desc: The androids hit the road in pursuit of Goku, but they're delayed by some hyperactive hoodlums. Krillin and Trunks race to move Goku to a safer hiding place, and Kami wrestles with Piccolo's difficult offer.

title: Unwelcome Discovery
desc: Trunks must face the fact that he cannot change history and save his timeline.

title: Seized with Fear
desc: Trunks and Krillin join Bulma at the crash site of the mysterious time capsule and find an eerie clue: the shell of a large, locust-like creature! Whatever arrived in the time capsule isn't human, and it's on the loose!

title: The Reunion
desc: An insect-like monster threatens to turn Gingertown into a ghastly graveyard! In response to this new menace, Kami fuses with Piccolo, and the resulting Super Namekian flies to Gingertown for a showdown of epic proportions!

title: Borrowed Powers
desc: Gingertown becomes a battlefield as Piccolo confronts Cell. This monster from the future gains his strength by sucking the life out of his victims! But that's not the creature's only talent. He also knows the Kamehameha Wave!

title: His Name Is Cell
desc: Heavily-armored tanks fail to halt Cell's rampage, and now it's up to Piccolo to stop the monster! As the Namekian fights for survival, Cell reveals that he's actually an android, the ultimate achievement of Dr. Gero!

title: Piccolo's Folly
desc: Piccolo cleverly distracts Cell long enough to regenerate his arm. The Namekian is ready for another round, and Krillin and Trunks have arrived to provide backup! With the odds mounting against him, Cell makes a tactical decision.

title: Laboratory Basement
desc: With hopes of saving the future, Trunks and Krillin race to destroy Dr. Gero's lab. Meanwhile, Piccolo and Tien search for the elusive Cell. But how can they stop an enemy who knows their every move?

title: Our Hero Awakens
desc: In South City, Cell plows through more civilians and accidentally runs into Krillin! Goku finally gets back on his feet, but with Cell and the other androids in full stride, can the Saiyan hero still make a difference?

title: Time Chamber
desc: As Cell continues his deadly march, Goku hatches a plan to squeeze a year's worth of training into just one day! Back at Master Roshi's, the android trio arrives looking for Goku! Can Piccolo hold them off until the Saiyans return?

title: The Monster Is Coming
desc: Behind the closed doors of the Hyperbolic Time Chamber, Vegeta and Trunks struggle to push past the level of Super Saiyan! Down on Earth, Piccolo challenges Android 17 to a battle!

title: He's Here
desc: Stronger than ever after fusing with Kami, Piccolo leads the attack against the androids! It looks like the Super Namekian has things under control until Cell arrives on the battlefield! Can anyone stop this hideous monster?!

title: Up to Piccolo
desc: Just as Cell is about to absorb Android 17, Piccolo bravely steps in and foils the monster's plan! Does the Super Namekian really have a chance at stopping Cell on his own?! Or is he simply putting off the inevitable?

title: Silent Warrior
