desc: Goku and Frieza agree to keep the fight on the ground, and Frieza decides to fight without using his hands; Chi-Chi urges Dr. Briefs to fix the ship, which was broken by the Ox King; Yajirobe tries to sneak off while Puar and Oolong talk; Bulma finds Captain Ginyu, who is still in a frog's body.

title: Hattari ja nê zo!! Daitan suteki na Yatsu - Son Gokû
desc: After Goku refuses to join him, Frieza reveals that he has been using only one percent of his power. He charges to fifty percent, and he and Goku continue to fight. Meanwhile, Captain Ginyu, in Bulma's body, watches the battle as Bulma, in the frog's body, tries to tell Gohan what has happened. Back on Earth, Chi-Chi, Roshi, Yajirobe, Puar, and Oolong prepare for take... Read all

title: Ketchaku da!! Honô no keshin 20-ban Kaiô Ken no Kamehameha
desc: Goku loses hope as he is thrashed by Frieza, and he must rely on his love for his friends and family to summon enough strength to rebound. Meanwhile, Gohan must find a way to return Bulma to her own body.

title: Chô tokudai no Genki-Dama Kore ga saigo no kirifuda da!!
desc: Weakened from using Kaio-Ken X20, Goku takes a beating from Frieza until he receives a vision from Vegeta. Meanwhile, the Ginyu Force arrives on King Kai's planet.

title: Chansu o ikase!! Pikkoro sutemi no engo shageki
desc: Goku gathers energy for his spirit bomb. Meanwhile, the Ginyu Force tests its powers on King Kai's planet.

title: Genki-Dama no chô hakai-ryoku!! Ikinokotta no wa dare da!?
desc: Piccolo holds off Frieza while Goku finishes forming the spirit bomb. Meanwhile, Yamcha, Tien, and Chiaotzu fight the Ginyu Force.

title: Tsui ni henshin!! Densetsu no Sûpâ Saiya-jin: Son Gokû
desc: Goku, Krillin, Piccolo, and Gohan celebrate the defeat of Frieza, but they may be celebrating too soon. Meanwhile, Yamcha, Tien, and Chiaotzu continue fighting the Ginyu Force.

title: Ikari bakuhatsu!! Gokû yo, min'na no kataki o utte kure
desc: Goku, now a Super Saiyan, takes out his anger on Frieza; Gohan takes Piccolo to safety; Roshi senses Goku's new power.

title: Namekku-sei shômetsu ka!? Daichi o tsuranuku ma no senkô
desc: Frieza realizes that he can't defeat Goku, so he decides to destroy Namek; Gohan drops off Piccolo on the ship and looks for Bulma; there is a calamity at Frieza's base.

title: Katsu no wa ore da... Ikinokori o kaketa saishû kôgeki
desc: Goku and Frieza continue to fight as the planet falls apart around them, and Frieza charges to one hundred percent power. Meanwhile, Gohan searches for Bulma.

title: Shenron yo ushû o hashire!! Semaru Namekku-sei shômetsu no toki
desc: While Goku and Frieza continue to fight, Kami and King Kai discuss how they should use the wish from the dragon balls that Mr. Popo has collected. Also, Gohan and Bulma return to the ship and try to get it working.

title: Boku wa Son Gokû no musuko da!! Gohan, futatabi kessenjô e
desc: Goku and Frieza continue to fight; Gohan, no longer sensing his dad's power level, decides to leave the ship and face Frieza himself; Shenron works on granting the wish.

title: Ore wa Kono Hoshi ni Nokoru!! Shori e no Saigo no Negai
desc: While fighting Frieza, Goku asks King Kai to change the wish to allow him to stay on the planet and finish the fight. Guru relays this to Dende, who must make the wish before Frieza notices that the dragon is back.

title: Tokoton yarô ze!! Kieyuku hoshi ni nokotta futari
desc: Goku and Frieza continue to fight; Guru explains the wish to everyone who was brought to Earth; Piccolo thinks back on everything he and Goku have been through together; Vegeta explains his plan for when Goku and Frieza are dead.

title: Aware Furîza!! Furuedashitara tomoranai!!
desc: Goku and Frieza continue to fight, and Goku offers Frieza one last chance to live. Also, King Kai recaps Frieza's plan to destroy Namek. Back on Earth, the superstitious Bulma burns leaves and watches the burn pattern to determine if Goku will return from the battle.

title: Gokû no shôri sengen da!! Furîza ga jimetsu suru toki...
desc: Goku and Frieza continue to fight, with Goku trying to avoid Frieza's energy discs. Back on Earth, Vegeta thinks back on his hatred for Frieza, and he remembers the moment when he decided that he wanted to become strong enough to defeat Frieza.

title: Furîza yabureru!! Subete no ikari o kometa ichigeki
desc: Lying in pieces on the ground, the defeated Frieza taunts Goku, who is walking away. Frieza then thinks back on the fight. Back on Earth, the dying Guru appoints a new leader for the Nameks.

title: Namekku-sei dai bakuhatsu!! Uchû ni kieta Gokû
desc: As Goku is trying to escape from Namek, King Kai relates the action to Tien, Yamcha, and Chiaotzu. Afterward, Yamcha telepathically recounts it to Bulma through King Kai. Also, Gohan gets into a fight with Vegeta.

title: Ikite ita Son Gokû Z senchi ga zen'nin fukkatsu da!!
desc: Vegeta suggests a plan to bring Goku back; Bulma invites Vegeta and the Nameks to stay with her until they can relocate; the Namekian dragon balls are used to bring Yamcha, Krillin, Tien, and Chiaotzu back and to relocate the Nameks.

title: Tenkai ga taihen da!! Gârikku Jr ga Kami ni naru!?
desc: Start of the "Garlic Jr. Saga". Garlic Jr. has returned from the Dead Zone to hatch a sinister plot of revenge upon those responsible for his defeat; Gohan meets up with Krillin and Krillin's girlfriend Maron; Piccolo splits himself in four and spars with himself, and he meets with Kami; Garlic Jr. and his goons invade the Lookout; there is a reunion party at Roshi's,... Read all

title: Kyôfu no kuroi kiri...!! Min'na mazoku ni natchatta
desc: As the black water mist spreads, Garlic Jr. reveals his plan to wish his father back and to get revenge on Goku and Gohan; Gohan and Icarus run into a group of animals who have been affected by the mist; Kami tells Mr. Popo that the Serpent race that Garlic Jr. belongs to has long been an evil race that wants only destruction; Chi-Chi arrives at Roshi's house looking ... Read all

title: Tenkai ga senjô da!! Pikkoro ga mazoku ni gyakumodori...
desc: Spice reveals to Piccolo how Garlic Jr. escaped from the Dead Zone using the Makyo Star; Krillin and Gohan go to the Lookout to find the sacred water while Piccolo stays behind to fight; in outer space, Vegeta looks for Goku.

title: Pikkoro to chokusetsu taiketsu! Tenkai ni ikari no Masenkô
desc: Gohan and Krillin fight the Spice Boys; Yajirobe and Korin cook for Maron; Vegeta trains on a distant planet while looking for answers.

title: Min'na no kokoro o torimodose!! Shinden ni nemuru chô shinzui
desc: Gohan fights Piccolo while Krillin tries to save Kami and Mr. Popo from Garlic Jr. Also, Yajirobe and Korin play cards with Maron.

title: Asa made matenai!! Kami-Sama no kakugo o kimeta kesshikô
desc: Piccolo explains to Gohan what his plan was; Piccolo, Gohan, and Krillin hold off Garlic Jr., Spice, and Vinegar while Kami and Mr. Popo take the sacred water to the seven air currents of the world; Vegeta fights a group of Frieza's thugs while he searches for Goku.

title: Chô kageki ni shôbu da!! Okite yaburi no Kami-Sama
desc: Gohan, Krillin, and Piccolo fight with Garlic Jr., Spice, and Vinegar, all three of whom are now powered up. Meanwhile, Kami and Mr. Popo carry the sacred water through the realm of the dead guardians of Earth in an attempt to reach the seven air currents, but the former guardians attempt to drain Kami's life force and keep him there forever.

title: Kîta ze chô-shinsui!! Sekai ga akumu kara sameta
desc: Gohan, Krillin, and Piccolo fight Garlic, Jr. Meanwhile, Kami tries to convince the former guardians of the Earth to allow him to spread the sacred water.

title: Gohan ni isshun no shôki!! Ano Makyô-sei o ute...
desc: Gohan keeps his shield up to prevent himself, Krillin, and Piccolo from being sucked into the dead zone, but Piccolo tries to convince him to lower the shield and to destroy the Makyo Star, thus destroying the source of Garlic, Jr.'s, power. Meanwhile, Kami struggles to survive as he is tortured by the former guardians of Earth.

title: Otoko da nê... Kuririn 101-kaime no puropôzu
desc: Krillin goes shopping with Maron, and he contemplates marriage. Also, everyone is called to the Kame house for Turtle's 1000th birthday party. While there, Krillin goes deep sea diving with Gohan in search of the Mermaid's Tear, the world's largest pearl, which he plans to give to Maron.

title: Are ga chikyû da yo papa... Furîza oyako no gyakushû
desc: Start of the "Trunks Saga". While thinking about his decision to break up with Maron, Krillin trains hard to improve his Kamehameha wave. Chi-Chi gets Gohan a tutor named Mr. Shu, who is very strict. Bulma tells Yamcha about a dream she had of Vegeta. Vegeta returns to Earth in search of Goku and a revitalized Frieza sets his sights on Earth.

title: Furîza wa boku ga taosu... Gokû o matsu nazo no shônen
desc: The Z Warriors fly to the suspected sight of the upcoming battle, Frieza and King Cold land their ship, and both sides prepare for battle.

title: Furîza o ittô ryôdan!! Mô hitori no Sûpâ Saiya-jin
desc: The mysterious warrior fights Frieza and his goons. Meanwhile, the Z Warriors detect his power level and move toward the fight.

title: Ossu!! Hisashiburi... Kaette kita Son Gokû
desc: The mysterious Super Saiyan fights King Cold, and everyone waits on Goku's return.

title: Boku no chichi wa Bejîta desu... Nazo no shônen no kokuhaku
desc: After testing his strength against Goku, the Super Saiyan reveals himself to be Trunks, the son of Bulma and Vegeta from the future. He warns Goku of an upcoming battle with the Androids, which will determine the fate of the entire world.

title: Gokû no shin hissatsuwaza!? Mite kure, ore no Shunkanidô
desc: Goku tells of his escape from Namek and his time spent on the planet Yardrat, and he demonstrates the Instant Transmission technique, which the people of Yardrat taught him. Also, the Z Warriors formulate a plan to fight the Androids, and they all leave to train for the upcoming battle.

title: Koete yaru... Gokû o!! Sentô minzoku Saiya-jin no Ô
desc: In a desperate attempt to become a Super Saiyan, Vegeta begins a grueling training regiment. Despite suffering from injuries, he carries on as Bulma tries to convince him to slow down. Also, Yamcha watches him train and tries to keep up. Meanwhile, Goku, Gohan, and Piccolo train together.

title: Menkyo kaiden? Gokû no arata naru shiren
desc: On her way home from the grocery, Chi-Chi is chased by a wild boar. Mad that she doesn't have a car, she makes a deal with Goku and Piccolo that she will keep doing their chores if they get their driver's licenses. Meanwhile, Vegeta keeps training hard.

title: Kehai o motanu satsujinki Doitsu ga jinzôningen da!?
desc: The Z Warriors arrive at the designated spot to wait for the Androids, who appear and start their attack on the city.

title: Reiketsu 20-gô no akugyaku hidô!! Gokû · ikari no chô-henshin
desc: The rest of the Z Warriors arrive to save Yamcha. Krillin takes him to safety while the others lead the Androids away from the city.

title: Gokû, daburu shokku!! Yamai to teki no hasamiuchi
desc: Goku fights Android No. 19. Meanwhile, Roshi tells Maron, who has shown up at his house looking for Krillin, about the Red Ribbon Army.

title: Bejîta tsuyoshi!! Mezameru Sûpâ Saiya-jin no chi
desc: Goku fights against his virus as Android No. 19 beats him up, and Vegeta steps in to save him. Meanwhile, Yajirobe plays with baby Trunks, and he drives Bulma to see the battle.

title: 20-gô no futeki na warai... Dokutâ Gero no himitsu
desc: Vegeta fights the Androids as Yamcha flies Goku home to get the antidote for his virus.

title: Jijitsu wa mirai yori osoroshî!? Torankusu no giwaku
desc: The Z Fighters look for Android 20 as he watches them and determines who he will steal power from, and he fights Piccolo; Trunks returns; Goku gets his medicine.

title: Tsuigeki!! Dokutâ Gero nazo no kenkyûjo o sagashidase
desc: During the confusion after the explosion of Bulma's ship, Android 20 retreats to activate Androids 17 and 18; Trunks grows angry with Vegeta for not trying to save Bulma; the Z Fighters debate their next move.

title: Soshite kyôfu ga genjitsu ni... Mezameru 17-gô to 18-gô!!
desc: The Z Fighters look for Dr. Gero's lab while he tries to beat them there; Gohan flies Bulma, baby Trunks, and Yajirobe home; Goku fights the virus.

title: Subete ga teokure ka!? Gokû o korosu saishû heiki
desc: After Androids 17 and 18 mutiny on Dr. Gero, they activate Android 16 and go after Goku. Vegeta follows the Androids while Goku continues to fight the virus as Chi-Chi cooks for him. Gohan stops so that Bulma and Yajirobe can change Trunks' diaper.

title: Kawaî kao de chô pâwâ!? 18-gô ni shikaku nashi
desc: Vegeta fights Android 18 while the rest of the Z Fighters fly toward the battle; Gohan continues to fly Bulma, Trunks, and Yajirobe home; Maron surfs while she stays at Roshi's house.

title: Darenimo yatsura o tomerarenai... Z Senshi zenmetsu ka!?
desc: The rest of the Z Fighters jump in to help Vegeta, and Android 17 joins the fight; Turtle saves Maron from drowning and fights off two guys who are trying to pick her up.

title: Pikkoro no ketsui!! Totte oki no saigo no shudan
desc: Krillin heals everyone with senzu beans. Vegeta flies off in a rage and Piccolo goes to the Lookout to speak with Kami. Krillin, Trunks, and Tien go to pick up Goku, who is still fighting the virus while Maron leaves Roshi's house. Gohan drops off Bulma, baby Trunks, and Yajirobe at Dr. Brief's house.

title: Aruku chô hakai heiki!! Jinzôningen ga Gokû ni semaru
desc: Piccolo tries to convince Kami to merge with him; Tien goes to pick up Chiaotzu while Krillin and Trunks continue on to pick up Goku; the Androids hijack a truck, and they run afoul of a motorcycle gang.

title: Fukitsu na yokan! Buruma ga shiraseta misuterî
desc: Tien picks up Chiaotzu while the rest of the Z Fighters fly to Roshi's house as Trunks thinks about his world and how to defeat the Androids. Goku dreams about the Androids and the Androids in turn continue driving to Goku's house. Vegeta vows to ascend to an even more powerful level and Bulma reports a strange finding to Krillin and Trunks.

title: Jâku no tamago o hakken!! Kyôfu suru Torankusu
desc: Start of the "Imperfect Cell Saga". Trunks, Gohan, and Bulma investigate the 2nd time machine; Goku is flown to Roshi's house; the Androids continue driving to Goku's hose; Kami, while considering Piccolo's suggestion, tells of a new disturbance that he senses.

title: Katsute nai teki ni mukete... Sûpâ Namekku-seijin tanjô!!
desc: The Androids battle with the police after No. 18 steals a dress; Bulma and everyone at Roshi's house, while watching the news on the television, see a crisis unfold at Gingertown; Piccolo and Kami merge.

title: Kamehameha!? Gokû no Ki o motsu monsutâ
desc: Piccolo faces the creature in Gingertown; the Z Warriors sense the creature's power level, but they can't determine who or what it is, sensing him as a combination of their friends and foes; Trunks and Krillin fly to Gingertown; Android No. 16 picks up Piccolo's and the creature's power levels.

title: Zôo to hakai no seimei-tai!! Yatsu no na wa Jinzôningen Seru
desc: The creature grabs Piccolo, draining his life force as a group of tanks enters the city and shoots at him. Also, the creature explains his origin to Piccolo. Meanwhile, Goku lies in bed recovering, and Gohan watches the TV news report on the crisis.

title: Pikkoro tsûkon no dai shippai! Seru ga machi ni hanatareta!
desc: Krillin and Trunks arrive to help Piccolo, but Cell leaves to recharge his energy before he takes on the Androids. Also, Piccolo explains what Cell is to the other Z Warriors.

title: Seru tanjô no himitsu! Kenkyûjo no chika ni nani ga aru!?
desc: Vegeta leaves to train by himself; Trunks and Krillin go to Gero's lab to destroy the fetus Cell from the present so that he cannot be born; Piccolo and Tien chase after the matured Cell from the future; Cell goes to Nickytown to restore his energy.

title: Gokû tatakai e no mezame! Sûpa Saiya-jin o koero!!
desc: Cell runs amok in Nickytown; Krillin saves a young girl and her little brother and fights Cell; Piccolo and Tien arrive to help Krillin; Trunks contemplates recent events as he looks for Vegeta; the Androids drive through the woods while looking for Goku's house; the Z Warriors look for Cell; Goku awakens.

title: Shugyô o isoge Saiya-jin! Seishin to toki no heya de...
desc: Goku rounds up Gohan, Trunks, and Vegeta and takes them to the Lookout, where they will train in the Time Chamber in hopes of reaching a level beyond that of a Super Saiyan. Meanwhile, the other Z Warriors look for Cell in an amusement park. Also, the Androids continue looking for Goku.

title: Ten o saku gekiretsu kôdan!! Pikkoro VS Jinzôningen 17-gô
desc: Piccolo fights Android 17. Meanwhile, Goku and Gohan wait for Trunks and Vegeta to finish their training in the Time Chamber. Also, Bulma works on deciphering the schematics for the Androids.

title: Kono hi o matte ita!! Seru · kanzentai e no jokyoku
desc: Piccolo continues fighting Android 17 as Cell flies toward them. Meanwhile, Bulma finishes deciphering the Android schematics, and Goku and Gohan continue waiting on Trunks and Vegeta.

title: Sutemi no hangeki oyobazu! Pikkoro moetsukiru!!
desc: Cell fights Piccolo and Android 17. Meanwhile, Krillin goes to meet Bulma to get the remote control, and Tien goes to help Piccolo.

title: Nokosareta yuîtsu no nozomi... Mugon no senshi 16-gô tatsu!!
desc: Goku, Gohan, and Mr. Popo all express anger and sadness at the defeat of Piccolo; Bulma flies toward the Z Warriors with the remote control; Cell fights Androids 17 and 16.

title: 17-gô o nomikonda... Henshin Seru wa chô gurume
desc: Android 16 and Tien fight Cell in an attempt to protect Androids 17 and 18.

title: Ashita wa omê o tatakinomesu!! Gokû no chôsenjô
desc: Start of the "Perfect Cell Saga". Tien holds off Cell as Androids 16 and 18 escape, and Yamcha, Chiaotzu, Goku, and Gohan all debate helping him. Meanwhile, Krillin gets the remote from Bulma.

title: Subete ore ga katazukeru!! Shinsei Bejîta oyako shutsugen
desc: After Bulma brings them new Saiyan armor, Vegeta and Trunks go after Cell as Goku and Gohan prepare to enter the Time Chamber. Meanwhile, Cell looks for the Androids.

title: Ikinari zenkai!! Hikari kagayaku Bejîta no chô pâwâ
desc: Vegeta challenges Cell, who is still looking for the Androids. Meanwhile, Goku gives Gohan a pep talk in the Time Chamber.

title: Seru yo hizamazuke! Ore wa Sûpâ Bejîta da!!
desc: Vegeta fights Cell while Trunks recalls his experiences in the Time Chamber. Meanwhile, Goku trains Gohan in the Chamber.

title: Kiken'na puraido!! Kanzentai Seru e no chôsen
desc: Vegeta continues his fight with Cell. In the Time Chamber, Goku trains his Kamehameha Wave, and Gohan convinces Goku to let him train harder after having a dream of almost becoming a Super Saiyan.

title: Ore nayanjau!! Kuririn no 18-gô hakai kôsaku
desc: Cell tries to convince Vegeta to allow him to absorb Android 18 in order to reach his perfect form, thus giving Vegeta the challenge he desires. Meanwhile, Krillin tries to get close enough to the Androids to use the remote and destroy 18, but his feelings for her get in the way.

title: Zen uchû ni shôgeki!! Seru, kanzentai e kyôi no shinka
desc: Having convinced Vegeta to step aside, Cell goes after Android 18. Trunks tries to stop Cell, but Vegeta, wanting Cell to reach his perfect form, fends Trunks off.

title: Sentô-ryoku mugendai!! Seru to iu na no hakaishin tanjô
desc: Cell completes his transformation. In the Time Chamber, Gohan pushes Goku to train him harder.

title: Sûpâ Bejîta ayaushi!! Kanzen muketsu no kyôfu ga semaru!!
desc: Trunks revives Krillin while Vegeta fights Cell. In the Time Chamber, Goku and Gohan train together as Super Saiyans.

title: Sûpâ Saiya-jin no genkai toppa!! Arashi o yobu Torankusu
desc: Vegeta makes a final attempt to defeat Cell as Trunks waits for the right time to step in.

title: Chichi o sukue!! Ten o mo kogasu Torankusu no ikari
desc: Trunks powers up and fights Cell while Krillin takes Vegeta to safety. In the Time Chamber, Goku and Gohan continue to train.

title: Zetsubô no mirai!! Jigoku o ikinuita otoko Torankusu
desc: Trunks reflects on his past and why he is in this dimension, and Cell does the same.

title: Sûpâ Torankusu ni jakuten!! Seru, shôgeki no bakudan hatsugen
desc: Trunks continues to fight Cell while Krillin revives Vegeta with a senzu bean. In the Time Chamber, Goku discovers a weakness in the new form that he and Trunks have mastered.

title: Gokû ni semaru daikessen!! Shin Tenka'ichi Budôkai no nazo
desc: Start of the "Cell Games Saga". Trunks explains Cell's tournament to the Z Fighters; Krillin takes Android 16 to Bulma so that she can repair him; Goku and Gohan continue to train in the Time Chamber; Roshi recaps the events of the previous World Martial Arts Tournaments; Cell builds an arena for his tournament.

title: Shichô-ritsu 100%!! Shi o yobe Seru Gêmu dokusen namahôsô
desc: Dr. Brief takes a look at Android 16; Yamcha and Krillin decide to train; Gohan has a bad dream about Cell; Cell announces his tournament on TV.

title: Gokû to Gohan... Hîrô oyako kyûkyoku reberu appu
desc: Goku and Gohan emerge from the Time Chamber, and Goku uses his instant transmission to pay a visit to Cell in order to see how powerful he is in his perfect form; meanwhile, people are fleeing from the cities and Dr. Brief and Bulma run tests on Android 16.

title: Gokû no yoyû!? Yasunde matou Seru Gêmu
desc: Goku asks Korin to compare his strength to Cell's. He and Gohan then pick up Chi-Chi from Roshi's, and they spend the rest of the day relaxing and fishing with Krillin. Meanwhile, Cell trains in space.

title: Senshi no kyûsoku... Shôjo to uso to Gohan no ketsui
desc: While on an errand for his mom, Gohan stops in Chazke Village. He finds that Mr. Bourbon, the tycoon who runs the city, has built a shelter to protect the town from Cell, and that he manipulates the townspeople into doing what he wants. To make matters worse, he has hired General Tao as his right hand man. Along with an elderly shopkeeper named Lao and Lao's granddaug... Read all

title: Himerareta chikara!! Gohan ga akanbô datta koro
desc: Chi-Chi kicks Goku out of the house so that she can prepare for Gohan's birthday party. She looks through a photo album and thinks back on how she and Goku chose Gohan's name. Meanwhile, Goku fishes with Krillin, and he recalls a time when he lost control of Gohan's stroller.

title: Kami-Sama o sagashidase!! Gokû, dai shunkanidô
desc: Piccolo emerges from the Time Chamber, and Vegeta enters; Bulma works on Android 16; Goku, Gohan, Krillin, and Chi-Chi have a picnic; the military attacks Cell; Goku sets out to find a new guardian for Earth.

title: Dende no hatsu shigoto!! Doragon Bôru fukkatsu da
desc: Goku takes Dende to the Lookout, then takes Gohan and Krillin to see him. At the Lookout, Dende recreates the dragon balls, and Goku goes after them. Meanwhile, Mr. Hercule Satan, the champion of the most recent World Martial Arts Tournament, announces his entry into the Cell Games.

title: Gokû ni nanmon!? Doragon Bôru o tori modose
desc: As Goku looks for the dragon balls, he runs into General Tao, who is collecting the dragon balls for a gangster. Meanwhile, Vegeta emerges from the Time Chamber, and Hercule Satan plays to a crowd.

title: Seru ni idomo mono-tachi!! Kessen no makuake
desc: The Z Fighters fly to the Cell Games, and Hercule Satan taunts Cell.

title: Chotto matta!! Satan gundan oabare
desc: Two of Hercule Satan's students, Piroshki and Caroni, arrive, and all three fight Cell.

title: Shôbuda Gokû!! Chô kinpaku Seru Gêmu
desc: The fight between Goku and Cell begins.

title: Chikyû chokugeki!! Seru no tokudai Kamehameha
desc: After powering up, Goku and Cell continue to fight. Cell uses Tien's Multi-Form Technique, Frieza's energy disk, and the Kamehameha Wave.

title: Haiboku ka shi ka!? Gokû, gyakuten no hisaku
desc: Goku and Cell speed up their fighting, and Cell destroys the arena. Meanwhile, Dende watches from the Lookout.

title: Shitô ni ketchaku!! Gokû no kôsan sengen!?
desc: Cell regenerates and continues to fight as Goku's energy dwindles.

title: Saikyô o tsugu mono... Sono na wa Gohan
desc: Goku bows out, and Gohan steps in to fight Cell.

title: Ikare Gohan nemureru chikara o yobi okose
desc: Gohan fights Cell, and he tells Cell about the dramatic increase in his power when he is angered.

title: Chitcha na kyôi!! Seru Junia raishû
desc: Cell tries to anger Gohan in order to see his true power, and Android 16 joins the fight.

title: 16-gô muzan!! Ugokidasu ikari no Sûpâ Gohan
desc: The Cell Juniors attack the Z Fighters.

title: Fukiareru shin no chikara!! Seru Junia funsai
desc: Having reached a higher power level through his anger, Gohan single-handedly takes on the Cell Juniors.

title: Seru o KO!! Tatta 2-hatsu no chô tekken
desc: Gohan fights Cell, who charges to his full power, and Trunks revives the other Z Fighters with senzu beans.

title: Seru ni ihen!! Kuzusareta kansentai
desc: Gohan walks through Cell's best attacks like they are nothing, so Cell tries to destroy the Earth.

title: Bai bai min'na!! Gokû saigo no shinkanidô
desc: Having been reverted to his imperfect form after Gohan's last attack, Cell, in a last ditch effort, again tries to destroy the Earth, and Goku must stop him.

title: Hakuchû no akumu!! Kyôfu wa yori kanpeki ni
desc: Cell explains how he survived the blast, and Vegeta, filled with rage over Cell's attack on Trunks, goes ballistic and fights Cell.

title: Gokû kara Gohan e... Chichi no tamashî wa tsutawatta
desc: Cell explains how he traveled to this time-line and how he reached his perfect form, and Goku telepathically gives Gohan an inspirational speech. Meanwhile, Fortune Teller Baba lets Chi-Chi watch the battle through her crystal ball.

title: Tataki wa owatta... Arigatô Son Gokû
desc: Gohan and Cell match energy waves, and each one struggles for control. Also, the other Z Fighters help Gohan.

title: Ora ano yo de shûgyô suru!! Egao no wakare
desc: Krillin, Yamcha, Tien, and Piccolo take Android 18, Gohan, and Trunks to the Lookout so that Dende can heal them, and they all summon the eternal dragon to undo the damage that Cell caused. Vegeta, angered by the death of Goku and embarrassed by his inferiority to Gohan and Cell, vows to never fight again. Hercule Satan takes the credit for Cell's defeat.

title: Atarashî hibi... Tôsan! Boku ganbaru
desc: After Krillin uses the second wish to remove the bomb from inside Android 18, the Z Fighters all go their separate ways--Gohan goes home to tell Chi-Chi about Goku's death, and he spends time with the Ox King. Trunks goes back to his own time; and Piccolo remains at the Lookout. Meanwhile, Hercule Satan displays his martial arts skills on TV, and Goku and King Kai dec... Read all

title: Môhitotsu no ketsumatsu!! Mirai wa ore ga mamoru
desc: Back in his own time, Trunks fights the Androids and Cell. Meanwhile, Goku and King Kai decide to travel across Other World.

title: Dai kangeki!! Ita zo! Ano yo no sugê yatsu
desc: Start of the "Great Saiyaman Saga". After King Kai explains to Goku that there are actually four Kais and one Grand Kai, they go to visit the Grand Kai's planet. There, Kai has words with West Kai, Goku meets a fighter named Pikkon, and Goku and Pikkon go to hell to stop Cell and Frieza, who are running amok.

title: Anoyo ichi wa ora da!! Rekidai no yûsha dai shûgô
desc: Goku meets the other warriors from the North quadrant, and the other Kais give King Kai grief for being dead. The Kais propose a tournament to be held amongst the warriors on the planet, and Goku races East Kai to determine if he deserves to be included.

title: Dai Kaiô-sei nekkyô!! Makiokose Gokû senpû
desc: The quarter-finals of the Other World Tournament begin: Torbie faces Tapkar, Froug faces Maraikoh, Arqua faces Goku, and Pikkon faces Olibu.

title: Honô no kesshô!! Gokû ka Paikûhan ka!?
desc: The semi-finals of the Other World Tournament begin: Goku faces Maraikoh, and Pikkon faces Torbie. Also, the finals begin.

title: Nogasu na shôri!! Kimero chôsoku Kamehameha
desc: Goku faces Pikkon in the finals of the Other World Tournament.

title: Are kara 7-nen! Kyô kara boku wa kôkôsei
desc: After foiling a bank robbery, Gohan tries to fit in and make friends on his first day of high school, all while trying to hide his powers from everyone.

title: Ai to seigi no Gurêto Saiyaman sanjô
desc: Gohan gets Bulma to make a costume for him, and he takes it for a spin. While patrolling, he prevents a crazy driver from causing too much damage, and he stops a bus hijacking with Videl.

title: Gohan no hachamecha hatsu dêto!?
desc: When Gohan's classmate Angela learns his big secret, she blackmails him into going on a date. As Saiyaman, Gohan helps put out a building fire with Videl.

title: Gohan, kinkyû shutsudô! Bîderu o sukue!!
desc: Videl follows Saiyaman in an attempt to learn his identity. Also, the Red Shark Gang holds the mayor hostage, and Gohan (as Saiyaman) and Videl must rescue him.

title: Tônan jiken hassei!! Han'nin wa Saiyaman!?
desc: Gohan steals a baby dinosaur from the circus in an attempt to return him to his parents before they go on a rampage, and he is chased by Videl and the police.

title: Gokû mo fukkatsu!? Tenka'ichi Budôkai shitsujô da!!
desc: Gohan gets Bulma to make him a new costume for the World Martial Arts Tournament, and Vegeta announces his entry into the tournament. Also, Goku announces that he will be allowed to come back to Earth for one day to compete, and Gohan, while on the way to tell his friends of Goku's return, stumbles onto the set of a Great Saiyaman movie.

title: Gohan mo bikkuri! Goten no bakuhatsu pawâ
desc: The Z Fighters train for the upcoming World Martial Arts Tournament. While training, Gohan finds out some surprising information regarding Goten.

title: A tobeta!! Bîderu no bukujutsu nyûmon
desc: Gohan teaches Goten and Videl to fly; Goku trains in Other World as King Kai challenges South Kai to enter his new fighter in the World Martial Arts Tournament with Goku; Vegeta and Trunks train in the gravity chamber.

title: Okaeri Gokû! Zetto chîmu zen'in shûgô!!
desc: The Z Fighters finish their training and go to the World Martial Arts Tournament.

title: Ayaushi Saiyaman! Gekisha ni goyôjin!?
desc: After failing to woo Videl, Sharpener tries to discover the identity of Saiyaman as all of the fighters attempt to earn a spot in the World Martial Arts Tournament by scoring highly on a machine that measures striking power.

title: Hanpa janai ze!! Chibi Torankusu
desc: The start of the "World Tournament Saga". The Junior World Martial Arts Tournament begins, and a filmed reenactment of the Cell Games, with Mr. Satan as the hero, is played on a giant TV screen.

title: Boku no deban da!! Goten, kinchô no daîssen
desc: Trunks and Goten rapidly advance to the finals of the Junior World Martial Arts Tournament, and the finals begin.

title: Ureshisa hyakumanbai! Shônen chanpion kettei!!
desc: Trunks and Goten continue fighting in the finals of the Junior World Martial Arts Tournament.

title: Dô suru Satan!? Shijô saidai no pinchi
desc: Having won the Junior World Martial Arts Tournament, Trunks gets to fight Mr. Satan in an exhibition match. Also, as the Z Fighters prepare for their own matches, they meet two other mysterious fighters.

title: Taisen aite kettei!! Hayaku yarô ze ikkaisen
desc: Trunks and Goten figure out a way to compete in the adult portion of the World Martial Arts Tournament, and all of the qualified fighters draw to see who will fight whom in the first round.

title: Dô shita Pikkoro!! Masa ka no fusenpai
desc: The first round of the World Martial Arts Tournament begins, with Krillin facing Pintar and Piccolo facing Shin.

title: Fujimi de bukimi!? Supopobitchi no nazo
desc: The first round of the World Martial Arts Tournament continues with Videl fighting Spopovitch. Also, Shin's true identity is revealed to Piccolo.

title: Bîderu muzan!! Deru ka ikari no sûpâ Gohan
desc: Videl and Spopovitch continue their fight in the first round of the World Martial Arts Tournament.

title: Barechatta!! Saiyaman wa Son Gohan
desc: Goku returns from Korin's Tower with some senzu beans, and Gohan takes them to Videl; Mr. Satan stays with Videl in the hospital; Spopovitch and Yamu monitor the power levels of the other fighters in the tournament; Gohan and Kibito get in the ring.

title: Ugomeku inbô!! Gohan no pawâ ga ubawareta
desc: After Gohan goes Super Saiyan, Spopovitch and Yamu drain his energy and fly away. Afterward, the Z Warriors follow them to see where they're going, and the mystery behind the recent events is explained to them by Shin and Kibito.

title: Kuromaku tôjô!! Aku no madôshi Babidi
desc: Start of the "Babidi Saga". The Z Fighters follow Spopovitch and Yamu to Babidi, and, while observing their meeting, they see some of Babidi's other henchmen. Back at the tournament, the crowd grows restless while waiting for the next fight.

title: Machiukeru wana!! Makai kara no chôsenjô
desc: After Dabura neutralizes Kibito, Krillin, and Piccolo, the other Z Fighters follow him into Babidi's spaceship.

title: Nameru na!! Bejîta ikari no shosen toppa
desc: Vegeta fights Pui Pui in Stage One of Babidi's ship. Back at the tournament, Goten and Trunks look for a place to relax.

title: Gokû pawâ zenkai!! Buttobe Yakon
desc: Goku fights Yakon in Stage Two of Babidi's ship. Back at the tournament, Trunks and Goten eat their way into trouble.

title: Dai gosan!! Satan VS 3-nin no chô senshi!?
desc: The Z Warriors wait on the Stage Three opponent, Dabura, as he meditates to gain strength. Back at the tournament, the five remaining fighters--Killa, Jewel, Mr. Satan, Mighty Mask, and Android 18--begin a battle royale to determine the winner of the tournament.

title: Tsuyoi ze chibikko!! 18-gô dai kusen!?
desc: The Z Fighters continue to wait on Dabura, who is still meditating. Back at the tournament, Android 18 fights Goten and Trunks (disguised as Mighty Mask) in the battle royale, as Mr. Satan sits back and watches.

title: Tachihadakaru Maô! Deban da Gohan!!
desc: Android 18 fights Mr. Satan in the World Martial Arts Tournament; after seeing each other while flying, Videl tells Trunks and Goten where their fathers are; the fight between Gohan and Dabura begins.

title: Mitsukerareta jashin!! Dâbura no meian
desc: Gohan's fight with Dabura continues. During the fight, Dabura notices that Vegeta has a dark side.

title: Hakai Ôji Bejîta fukkatsu!! Butô-kai ran'nyû
desc: Babidi takes over Vegeta's mind, and he transports the Z Fighters back to the tournament.

title: Shukumei no chô taiketsu!! Gekitotsu Gokû VS Bejîta
desc: Goku attempts to talk Vegeta into breaking Babidi's control over him while Babidi tries to convince Vegeta to kill the Supreme Kai.

title: Mattero Babidi!! Yabô wa yurusanai
desc: Goku fights Vegeta. Also, Gohan and the Supreme Kai make it to the inner sanctum of Babidi's ship.

title: Toketa fûin! Deru zo kyôaku Majin Bû!!
desc: Goku and Vegeta continue to fight, giving Majin Buu the energy he needs to hatch.

title: Fukkatsu sasenai!! Teikô no Kamehameha
desc: Gohan tries to destroy Majin Buu's egg before it hatches; Goku and Vegeta continue to fight; Mr. Satan reassures the crowd at the tournament; Trunks and Goten try to find the battle.

title: Zetsubô e itchokusen!? Nageki no Kaiôshin
desc: Majin Buu easily pummels Dabura; Goku tries to convince Vegeta to stop fighting with him so that they can concentrate on Majin Buu; Mr. Satan reflects on his experiences with the Z Fighters, and he is accosted by reporters; Babidi commands Majin Buu to kill Gohan and the Supreme Kai.

title: Majin osorubeshi!! Gohan ni semaru shi no kyôfu
desc: Gohan and the Supreme Kai fight Majin Buu; Mr. Satan attempts to fly; Dabura, realizing how dangerous Majin Buu is, tries to convince Babidi to reseal him before it's too late; Trunks and Goten reach the battle site.

title: Tabechauzo!! Harapeko Majin no chô nôryoku
desc: Dabura and Vegeta fight Majin Buu.

title: Senshi no ketsui!! Majin wa ore ga shimatsu suru
desc: Vegeta continues to fight Majin Buu.

title: Ai suru mono no tame ni... Bejîta chiru!!
desc: After being saved by the intervention of Trunks and Goten, Vegeta decides to put an end to Majin Buu, even if it costs him his life. Also, Piccolo fights with Babidi.

title: Akumu futatabi! Ikiteita Majin Bû
desc: In the aftermath of the battle with Majin Buu, the remaining Z Fighters and their friends look for survivors.

title: Bîderu-tachi no funtô! Sagase Doragon Bôru
desc: Having already found the first six Dragon Balls, Yamcha, Roshi, Android 18, Bulma, Chi-Chi, and Videl search for the last one. Piccolo and Krillin take Trunks and Goten to the Lookout to recover, and they talk with Dende about the current situation. Babidi and Majin Buu run amok and Goku wakes up.

title: Dekkai kibô!! Chibi-tachi no shin hissatsuwaza
desc: Goku, Piccolo, Krillin, Mr. Popo, and Dende discuss strategy for defeating Majin Buu, and Goku explains the Fusion Technique, which he learned in Other World; Majin Buu causes trouble at an amusement park; Bulma uses the dragon balls to call upon Shenron, the eternal dragon.

title: Goten Torankusu zensekai ni shimei tehai
desc: Kibito looks for Gohan and the Supreme Kai; Majin Buu causes trouble at a bakery; Goku tells those who do not know of Gohan and Vegeta's fates; Babidi telepathically communicates his plans and desires to everyone on Earth.

title: Gohan fukkatsu Kaiôshin no himitsu heiki!?
desc: Babidi and Majin Buu continue their reign of terror as they fish for the whereabouts of Trunks, Goten, and Piccolo. Trunks and Goten explore the Lookout. Gohan arrives on the Planet of the Kais with Kibito and the Supreme Kai, and he is told of the Z Sword.

title: Nuketaa~!! Densetsu no zetto sôdo
desc: Videl refuses to believe that Gohan is dead; Gohan removes the Z Sword and tries to wield it; Goku begins preparing Trunks and Goten for the Fusion Technique; Majin Buu destroys another city; Mr. Satan tries a new method of learning to fly, and his fans beg him to defeat Majin Buu.

title: Nerewareta nishi no miyako! Tomare Majin Bû!!
desc: Trunks and Goten practice raising their power to the same level for the Fusion Technique; Mr. Satan reassures the crowd; Babidi discovers that Trunks lives at Capsule Corporation, so Goku heads off Babidi and Majin Buu while Trunks races home.

title: Atto odoroku dai henshin!! Sûpâ Saiya-jin 3
desc: After explaining the different levels of a Saiyan to Babidi and Majin Buu, Goku transforms into Super Saiyan 3 and fights Majin Buu; at Capsule Corporation, Trunks looks for the dragon radar.

title: Bai Bai, Babidi!! Majin Bû hangyaku
desc: Goku continues his battle with Majin Buu as Trunks continues searching Capsule Corporation for the dragon radar. Back on the Planet of the Kais, Gohan continues to train with the Z Sword.

title: Mecha kakko warui!? Tokkun henshin pôzu
desc: Free from Babidi's control, Majin Buu causes even more destruction. Meanwhile, Gohan continues training with the Z Sword, and Goku teaches Trunks and Goten the Fusion Dance.

title: Jâ na min'na!! Gokû ano-yo ni kaeru
desc: Trunks and Goten continue to practice the Fusion Dance. Meanwhile, Majin Buu, after terrorizing a farm, builds a house and spends the day there.

title: Gohan wa dokoda!? Kaiôshin-kai no môtokkun
desc: Back in Other World, Goku finds Gohan on the Planet of the Kais and tells him what's been happening on Earth; Piccolo takes over the duty of training Trunks and Goten for the Fusion; Majin Buu befriends a blind boy.

title: Uso daro!? Zetto sôdo ga orechatta
desc: After Gohan accidentally breaks the Z Sword while testing its strength, an old Kai who was trapped inside the sword is released, and he promises to awaken Gohan's sleeping powers. Meanwhile, Trunks and Goten continue practicing the Fusion Dance.

title: Gattai chôjin tanjô!! Sono na wa Gotenkusu
desc: After several mess ups, Trunks and Goten finally fuse correctly, and the new entity, Gotenks, goes after Majin Buu, who is busy destroying ships. Meanwhile, Old Kai continues the ceremony to unlock Gohan's sleeping powers.

title: Saishû heiki shidô!? Satan wa chikyû o sukû
desc: Having been defeated easily by Majin Buu in their first battle, Trunks and Goten practice the Fusion Technique with renewed vigor; Mr. Satan emerges from his training facility and goes to Majin Buu's house; Old Kai finishes his ceremony to awaken Gohan's sleeping powers.

title: Korosu no yameta!! Majin Bû yoi ko sengen
desc: Gohan and Old Kai meditate; Trunks and Goten fuse while they are both Super Saiyans; two thugs run amok, killing everyone they see; Majin Buu befriends a puppy.

title: Nigero Satan!! Ikari no Majin Bû shutsugen
desc: Start of the "Fusion Saga". In a rage, Mr. Satan fights the two thugs. Majin Buu heals the puppy, rebuilds his house, and relaxes with Mr. Satan. Gohan grows impatient with waiting, and he tells Old Kai about Bulma. One of the thugs comes back to cause trouble for Majin Buu and Piccolo scolds Trunks and Goten for being gone for too long.

title: Dotchi ga katsu no!? Zen'aku Bû-Bû taiketsu
desc: Majin Buu fights Bad Buu; Trunks and Goten rest.

title: Matta nashi no hakyoku!! Chikyû jinrui zetsumetsu
desc: As Majin Buu waits on Gotenks, he goes about killing the rest of Earth's population; Krillin tries to sneak Trunks and Goten into the time chamber; Gohan grows increasingly impatient with waiting.

title: Tokkun seikô!! Kore de owari da Majin Bû
desc: Trunks and Goten train in the time chamber as Majin Buu waits and Piccolo stalls.

title: Honki de ikuze!! Sûpâ Gotenkusu zenkai
desc: Gotenks starts fast as he fights Majin Buu, using a variety of new techniques.

title: Yatta ze!! Obake de seikô Bû taiji!?
desc: Gotenks uses the Super Ghost Kamikaze Attack against Majin Buu; Goku can't sense Gotenks' or Majin Buu's energy, and he realizes that they're fighting in the time chamber; Mr. Satan and Bee wander the desert and think about their time with Majin Buu.

title: Ijigen kara no dasshutsu!! Sûpâ Gotenkusu 3
desc: Majin Buu escapes the time chamber. As Piccolo and Gotenks try to find a way out, Majin Buu terrorizes the Lookout, and Goku, Kibito, and the Supreme Kai look on helplessly through their crystal ball.

title: Norisugi!? Bû Bû Barêbôru
desc: Super Saiyan 3 Gotenks fights Majin Buu. Also, Mr. Satan and Bee find a city.

title: Masani gurêto!! Shinsei Gohan chikyû e
desc: As his fusion runs out, Gotenks continues fighting against Majin Buu. Also, Gohan finishes his training.

title: Bû o attô!! Gohan no mirakuru pawâ
desc: Goten and Trunks try to sneak up on Majin Buu, who has fallen asleep. Also, Gohan returns to Earth and fights Majin Buu.

title: Yatta ka!? Majin Bû dai bakuhatsu
desc: As Majin Buu continues to fight Gohan, he realizes that he can't win, so he self-destructs, hoping to take Gohan with him. Afterward, Gohan, Piccolo, Goten, and Trunks search for Dende, and they find Mr. Satan and Bee wandering in the desert.

title: Bû saiaku no hansoku!! Gotenkusu kyûshû!?
desc: Majin Buu absorbs Gotenks and Piccolo, and he continues to fight Gohan.

title: Zen uchû no tame ni... Yomigaere Son Gokû
desc: Majin Buu pummels Gohan as Goku and Vegeta prepare to return to Earth.

title: Kiseki wa ishido... Naru ka Gohan to no chô gattai
desc: Old Kai explains to Goku how the earring fusion works. Also, Tien and Goku show up to help Gohan, who is still getting pounded by Majin Buu.

title: Gattai!! Bejîta no hokori to Gokû no ikari
desc: Vegeta returns to Earth, and he and Goku fight Majin Buu. Also, Goku tries to convince Vegeta to fuse with him.

title: Sôzetsu pawâ!! Kyûkoku o koeru Bejitto
desc: Vegito, the fusion between Goku and Vegeta, fights Majin Buu; Dende and Mr. Satan look for the battle; in Other World, Videl, Chi-Chi, Bulma, and Dabura look for Gohan.

title: Jigen ni keretsu!! Bû ga kirechatta!?
desc: Super Saiyan Vegito fights Majin Buu; Krillin gets the tour of the Grand Kai's planet as Yamcha trains.

title: Bû no oku no te!! Amedama ni natchae
desc: Vegito continues fighting Majin Buu, who is getting frustrated and is using the special attacks of the people he has absorbed. In Other World, Videl tries to convince everyone that Gohan is still alive.

title: Hîrô sôshitsu!? Kyûshû sareta Bejitto
desc: Vegito is turned into candy by Majin Buu, but he continues to fight; King Kai considers sending Krillin and Yamcha back to Earth to help in the battle; King Yemma tells Fortune Teller Baba the story of how he convinced Vegeta to help.

title: Ma no meikyû!! Bû no onaka ni nani ga aru!?
desc: Goku and Vegeta, separated inside Majin Buu's body, try to find a way out. Meanwhile, Majin Buu, thrilled with himself for having absorbed Vegito, goes on a destructive rampage.

title: Akumu ka maboroshi ka!? Gokû to Gohan no oyako taiketsu
desc: Goku and Vegeta befriend a family of worms living inside Majin Buu. They continue searching for Trunks, Goten, Gohan, and Piccolo, but instead they find versions of them that Majin Buu has created in his mind, and they must fight them. Meanwhile, Majin Buu eats everything he can find.

title: Majin no himitsu!! Bû no naka ni 2-ri no Bû
desc: Goku and Vegeta try to rescue their friends from Majin Buu's mind, and they find the good Buu trapped their as well. Also, Majin Buu enters his own mind and fights Goku and Vegeta.

title: Deguchi wa doko da!? Kusureru Bû kara dasshutsu
desc: Start of the "Kid Buu Saga". Goku and Vegeta disconnect the good Buu from Majin Buu's mind, retrieve the pods containing their friends, and attempt to escape as Majin Buu's body begins to change.

title: Chikyû shômetsu!! Bû jâku e no gyaku henshin
desc: Kibito Kai tells the story of how Bibidi created Majin Buu, and his battle with the Kais. Also, Majin Buu attempts to destroy Earth.

title: Bû raishû!! Kaiôshin-kai de ketchaku da
desc: Mr. Satan tries to convince himself that everything that has happened is just a dream; Majin Buu destroys lots of planets while looking for Goku and Vegeta, who are trying to form a plan revolving around the use of the dragon balls.

title: Mirai o tsukame!! Uchû o kaketa daikessen
desc: Goku fights Majin Buu.

title: Bejîta datsubô!! Gokû omae ga No. 1 da
desc: Goku, now at Super Saiyan 3, and Vegeta take turns fighting Majin Buu, and Vegeta admires Goku's abilities.

title: Taenuke Bejîta!! Inochigake no 1-punkan
desc: Super Saiyan 3 Goku continues to fight Majin Buu, who taunts him. Also, Vegeta holds Majin Buu off so that Goku can power up.

title: Satan o ijimeru na!! Ganzo Bû fukkatsu
desc: Vegeta continues holding off Majin Buu as Goku powers up, and Mr. Satan lends a hand. Also, Kibito Kai and Dende consider helping.

title: Bejîta no hisaku!! Porunga to 2-tsu no negai
desc: Vegeta tells Dende, Kibito Kai, and Old Kai to go to New Namek so that they can use their dragon balls to restore Earth and its population. Meanwhile, good Majin Buu fights evil Majin Buu.

title: Saigo no kibô!! Tsukuru ze dekkai Genki-Dama
desc: Vegeta calls upon Earth's population to give up their energy to Goku, who begins charging his Spirit Bomb. Meanwhile, good Majin Buu continues to fight evil Majin Buu. Also, the people of Earth celebrate their new lives.

title: Chô kangeki!! Dekita ze min'na no Genki-Dama
desc: Good Majin Buu and Vegeta hold off evil Majin Buu as Goku and Mr. Satan beg the people of Earth for their help.

title: Yappari saikyô Son Gokû!! Majin Bû shômetsu
desc: After good Majin Buu and Mr. Satan save Vegeta, Goku releases his Spirit Bomb in a final attempt to destroy evil Majin Buu.

title: Modotta heiwa!! Seigi no mikata Majin Bû!?
desc: The Z Fighters and the people of Earth celebrate after the defeat of Majin Buu. Also, Dende heals good Majin Buu, who attempts to adjust to his new life on Earth.

title: Ozoi ze Gokû! Min'na de pâti!!
desc: The Z Fighters gather for a party at Bulma's house while Goku protects a bird's egg.

title: Gokû ojî-chan! Watashi ga Pan yo!!
desc: It is ten years after the defeat of Majin Buu. Trunks shows up at Goku's house, where he talks to Chi-Chi, Gohan, and Videl. He then goes out to the country to meet Goku and Goten, who are training. Vegeta and Bulma also arrive, and Goku tells everyone of his plans to enter the World Martial Arts Tournament because he thinks there will be a serious challenger this yea... Read all

title: Oura wa Ûbu! Ima 10-sai de moto Majin!?
desc: The competitors who have made it past the preliminary round of the World Martial Arts Tournament draw numbers to determine who will fight whom in the next round, and the fights begin as Pan faces Wild Tiger and Goku faces Uub.

title: Motto tsuyoku!! Gokû no yume wa chô dekkê
desc: Goku continues to fight Uub, the reincarnation of Majin Buu, at the World Martial Arts Tournament.

title: The Pants Tent
desc: An innocent bunch-up in Larry's trousers causes a misunderstanding with Cheryl's friend Nancy at the movies. He also manages to offend his friend Richard Lewis' new girlfriend.

title: Ted and Mary
desc: Larry and Cheryl enjoy their bowling double-date with Ted Danson and Mary Steenburgen, but it ends badly when Larry accuses the bowling alley of misplacing his sneakers. Later, Ted gets the wrong idea about Larry when he goes shopping with Mary at a downtown department store.

title: Porno Gil
desc: A bizarre chain of events starts with Larry accidentally being invited to have dinner with a former porno star, Gil, (Bob Odenkirk). The party turns out to be one disaster after another when Larry breaks a lamp, is forced to take off his shoes, loses his watch, gets lost along the way, and has to do the dreaded "double goodbye". Meanwhile, Jeff undergoes emergency sur... Read all

title: The Bracelet
desc: Larry gets into a tense, heated fight with Cheryl, and Larry's secretary suggests that he buy her a present to make up for it. After having lunch with Richard Lewis and helping a blind man, Larry spots the perfect present for Cheryl - a bracelet. Unfortunately, Richard also covets it.

title: Interior Decorator
desc: Larry holds an elevator for someone and ends up being delayed at the doctor's office. This causes him to miss an appointment with Diane Keaton. Cheryl's interior decorator happens to be Diane Keaton's won't give him Diane's phone number.

title: The Wire
desc: Cheryl gives Larry an ultimatum - bury the wire in the backyard - or else! But the permit the city gives Larry requires six signatures from his neighbors, and that means having to be nice to them at all costs - or else.

title: AAMCO
desc: Jeff buys a '57 Chevy and insists that Larry take it for a drive. At a stop sign, Larry mistakes the honking horn from an AAMCO commercial for the car behind him and yells at the other driver, who then hits the Chevy and speeds away. Luckily, Larry meets an antique auto mechanic at a dinner party who says he can fix Jeff's Chevy.

title: Beloved Aunt
desc: When Cheryl's aunt dies, the family asks Larry to write the obituary. But when it gets printed in the newspaper, an unfortunate typo lands Larry in the hot seat.

title: Affirmative Action
desc: Cheryl's quest to get a prescription filled is repeatedly complicated by Larry, including a bad joke that he tells in front of Richard Lewis' doctor.

title: The Group
desc: Thanks to Larry's manager Jeff, Cheryl is up for a part in "The Vagina Monologues." Meanwhile, Larry runs into an ex who asks him to accompany her to her incest-survivors group to lend moral support while she deals with her past.

title: The Car Salesman
desc: The Davids buy a house and move in but it makes settling sounds. Larry is not enthused about any show biz projects but does want and lands a car salesman job. Despite customers asking dumb questions, Larry does have a one ready to buy.

title: Thor
desc: Larry drives to meet Jason Alexander. A professional wrestler, Thor, yells at him for a finger gun shootout with his kids. Later, Larry's tires are slashed and he figures Thor. Recently separated, Jeff fears for sex secrets he told Susie.

title: Trick or Treat
desc: Larry offends two uncostumed trick-or-treaters by not giving them candy, so they show him the "trick" side of Halloween. He also alienates Cheryl's screenwriter friend Cliff and a Jewish neighbor AND spoils his romantic anniversary gift when Jeff arrives to play a round of golf.

title: The Shrimp Incident
desc: Larry gets takeout food and has a run-in with the same TV executive he is about to meet with to discuss his TV pilot idea. But after he gets home, he accuses the network exec of taking some shrimp from his dinner.

title: The Thong
desc: Larry no longer feels comfortable going to his psychiatrist after he sees him wearing a thong at the beach.

title: The Acupuncturist
desc: Larry promises to pay an acupuncturist $5,000 if he can cure his neck. Meanwhile, a struggling writer asks Larry for a $5,000 loan which he promises to pay back after his father dies.

title: The Doll
desc: Larry's attendance at a screening results in chaos; an unlockable bathroom door causes trouble.

title: Shaq
desc: After Larry accidentally trips and injures Shaq during a Lakers game, everything seems to start going his way.

title: The Baptism
desc: Cheryl and Larry head to Monterey to attend her sister Becky's wedding...to a Jewish man who's converting to Christianity. When Larry misplaces the plane tickets, he accuses other passengers of stealing them.

title: The Massage
desc: In the second-season finale, Larry is busted by a restaurant owner for stealing forks. Julia Louis-Dreyfus becomes so frustrated by the incident that she drops out of the pilot, which ends Larry's quest to get it on TV. Meanwhile, Cheryl learns that Larry got a naughty massage and busts him for that. He later faces an ironic punishment for his restaurant crimes.

title: Chet's Shirt
desc: While comforting a friend whose husband passed away, Larry and Cheryl comment on the husband's shirt. Larry then goes to the department store the next day to buy it. Meanwhile, Jeff talks Larry into investing in a trendy new celebrity restaurant. Larry also gets into trouble when he throws away some trash in a random garbage can.

title: The Benadryl Brownie
desc: Thanks to Larry's miscommunication on his new cell phone, Richard Lewis' girlfriend succumbs to peanut allergies a week before they're supposed to go to the Emmy Awards. A practicing Christian Scientist, she doesn't take any medicine, so Richard and Larry devise a scheme to cook up some brownies laced with medicine. Like all things Larry does, the plan backfires.

title: Club Soda and Salt
desc: Larry, Jeff, and Ted scramble to find a chef for the new restaurant, but Larry doesn't like Ted's recommendation. While trying to find a replacement, Larry learns a few things - Cheryl has a new, male, tennis playing friend, people won't take a wedding gift after a year, and that club soda and salt will get stains out of anything.

title: The Nanny from Hell
desc: The restaurant investors plan a pool party, but only Larry and Jeff show up. Larry goes to use the bathroom in the main house, and winds up getting the nanny fired. Larry recommends the nanny to Jeff and Susie. After the nanny snaps, Suzie's life is threatened. Meanwhile, Richard Lewis tries to get into Bartlett's Book Of Quotations for claiming to have invented the p... Read all

title: The Terrorist Attack
desc: Larry offends Mindy Reiser, so when Wanda Sykes tells him in confidence about a prospective terrorist attack on L.A. he uses the secret to win her back, disrupting a charity gig featuring Alanis Morissette.

title: The Special Section
desc: Larry is distraught when he learns that his mother died while he was off shooting a movie in New York, and he doesn't learn about the news until two days after the funeral. Larry uses the loss to get out of a number of unappealing invitations, while plotting to move his mother away from the "special section" of the cemetery.

title: The Corpse-Sniffing Dog
desc: Jeff must leave his house because he's allergic to the guard dog Suzie bought. Larry tries to get Jeff and Suzie's daughter Sammy to give up the dog, but she won't. Larry looks for a way to please both Jeff's family and some friends who also want the dog.

title: Krazee-Eyez Killa
desc: Wanda Sykes' has a new boyfriend, gangsta rapper Krazee-Eyez Killa, who shares a little more with his new friend Larry David than a replacement jacket needed for a scene in the new Martin Scorcese film. Meanwhile, Larry offends Suzie by not taking the tour of her new house. Ultimately, in typical Larry David fashion, he ruins everything, through a conversation he has ... Read all

title: Mary, Joseph and Larry
desc: On December 23, Larry gets up to get a midnight snack and eats some cookies in the refrigerator. Unfortunately, those cookies were a nativity scene that Cheryl's devoutly religious sister was preparing, and now that it's Christmas Eve, it's too late to get a replacement, but Larry goes searching anyway, and finds a Live Nativity at a local church. Has the Grouch saved... Read all

title: The Grand Opening
desc: In the third-season finale, Bobo's Restaurant is two days away from being scheduled to open when Larry discovers that the head chef was hired while pretending to be bald. After firing him, Larry and Jeff scramble to find a replacement. During the process, Larry accidentally injures the most influential food critic in Los Angeles, who is coming to the opening. The food... Read all

title: Mel's Offer
desc: Mel Brooks sees Larry performing some karaoke at a bar one night and is quickly impressed with his singing abilities. He then invites Larry to audition to star in a Broadway production of "The Producers". But the deal quickly goes south once Mel hits Larry in the head and Larry's doctor drools on him.

title: Ben's Birthday Party
desc: Mel Brooks taps Ben Stiller to be Larry's co-star in The Producers. But when Larry accidentally punches Ben Stiller in the eye during a birthday party game gone wrong, Ben drops out of the production.

title: The Blind Date
desc: Larry makes a last-ditch effort to keep Ben Stiller in The Producers, and tries to keep a friend happy by setting him up with a blind date. Meanwhile, Jeff's bizarre sexual fantasy gets out in the open.

title: The Weatherman
desc: Larry questions a weatherman's ability to manipulate the media so he can have the country club to himself.

title: The 5 Wood
desc: Still thinking he flirted with her, Dalilah the Hygienist officially asks Larry out, but Oscar the dog causes a problem. Leo Funkhauser succumbs to the "good" Hodgkin's. During the viewing, Larry is disgusted to see what appears to be his five wood in the casket with Leo, and asks Jeff to switch clubs with Leo. The result of the incident finds Larry being kicked out o... Read all

title: The Car Pool Lane
desc: Larry scrambles to find tickets to a very promising Dodger game. But before he can go, he has to take care of a few things first. The duties include getting out of jury duty, driving a friend to the airport, and scoring some medical marijuana for his dad's glaucoma. Thankfully a run-in with a hooker helps make all the chores easier.

title: The Surrogate
desc: Larry needs a clean bill of health for "The Producers," but a little heart trouble means no dice. The doctor gives Larry a device called a "heart halter" that is used to monitor his heart. Larry uses the device to get out of some unappealing situations including a baby shower, accusations of blatant racism, and a car accident, which lands him in trouble with his Produ... Read all

title: Wandering Bear
desc: Larry and Jeff decide to buy a "Girls Gone Wild" video tape, and that lands them both in the hot seat with Larry's secretary and Jeff's wife after the dog leaves the house during the viewing of the tape. Meanwhile, Larry seeks the help of his native American gardener to cure Cheryl of a feminine problem after Larry mistakenly wears a condom inside out.

title: The Survivor
desc: Generations collide at a dinner party when a contestant from the television show "Survivor" and a Holocaust survivor clash, and Larry is caught in the middle. Larry and Cheryl renew their vows, but Larry has a hard time remembering his--or his lines for The Producers.

title: Opening Night
desc: In the fourth-season finale, Larry David flies to New York with fellow performers David Schwimmer and Cady Huffman to star on Broadway in "The Producers". Along the way, he argues with Schwimmer, develops a strange relationship with Huffman, finds he's tipping way too often and attempts to use his 10th anniversary gift from Cheryl. On stage, Larry and David put aside ... Read all

title: The Larry David Sandwich
desc: Larry is changed by a near-death experience, a revelation about his father, and a sandwich named after him.

title: The Bowtie
desc: Wanda Sykes thinks Larry purposefully adopted a dog she deems "racist", Larry falls off his pedestal as a friend of the lesbian community, and Larry hires a private investigator to uncover some information about his past.

title: The Christ Nail
desc: Larry goes bra-shopping for his maid, landing him in trouble with her husband and his neighbors.

title: Kamikaze Bingo
desc: Larry offends a Japanese art dealer by implying that his father was not a real Kamikaze pilot. Later, Larry accuses his own dad's retirement home of fixing their bingo game.

title: Lewis Needs a Kidney
desc: Larry learns that Richard Lewis is bedridden and needs a kidney transplant. Larry and Jeff both turn up as positive matches for Lewis, but neither one are willing to give up their precious organs that easily.

title: The Smoking Jacket
desc: Larry joins the "Make A Wish" foundation, and swaps his smoking jacket with Hugh Hefner.

title: The Seder
desc: A sex offender (Rob Corddry) moves into the neighborhood, and becomes friends with Larry. Larry also suspects that Dr. Mark is stealing his newspaper, after his neighbor Ethel claims she saw him take it. Tension mounts when all of these people are guests at Larry's Passover Seder.

title: The Ski Lift
desc: Larry's quest to get Richard Lewis a kidney takes a turn when Larry learns about the head of the kidney consortium. After befriending the guy, Larry invites him and his daughter on a ski trip. Like everything Larry does, the trip ends as badly as it started.

title: The Korean Bookie
desc: Larry takes his chances with a Korean Bookie. While Cheryl's friends get married on the beach, Larry accuses the Korean Bookie of cooking up Jeff's dog and serving him for dinner.

title: The End
desc: In the 5th season finale, Larry discovers who his real parents are, and flies to Arizona to meet them. After a life-changing religious revelation, Larry decides to give Richard Lewis his kidney. Will Larry survive the operation... or is it the end?

title: Meet the Blacks
desc: After Larry's quest to find the perfect excuse for missing a pair of parties backfires on him big time, he gets in a tense, heated fight with Cheryl. So to make up for it, he agrees to take in the Black Family, who lost their home in Hurricane Edna. But can the Blacks deal with Larry's total recklessness and lack of respect, not to mention his poorly planned pastry se... Read all

title: The Anonymous Donor
desc: Larry decides to be nice for a change and actually donate money to a worthy cause. But when he's revealed to be the anonymous donor for the hospital wing, Larry goes ballistic. He then accuses a dry cleaner of giving his jersey to someone else, and goes off in search of it. Meanwhile, Larry, Jeff, and the Blacks get their reputation stained.

title: The Ida Funkhouser Roadside Memorial
desc: A sweaty $50 bill, a sample abuser, a roadside memorial, and a private school superintendent are all things that intimidate Larry while he tries to help Marty Funkhauser cope with the sudden death of his mother in a freak accident.

title: The Lefty Call
desc: Questions about Larry's bathroom habits become concern when Larry gets Richard Lewis' girlfriend a job at a place across the hall from his office. Meanwhile an incident involving a waiter and some take-out food threatens Jeff's dog.

title: The Freak Book
desc: Larry's birthday gift to Ted Danson - a coffee table book called "Mondo Freaks" gets him in trouble with everyone he shows the book to, which includes Ted, the limo driver, tennis star John McEnroe, a group of random mourners, and Paul McCartney's ex-wife Heather Mills.

title: The Rat Dog
desc: A faulty toaster makes life difficult for Loretta and Leon. Larry repeatedly offends a hearing impaired girl about the small dog she keeps with her. Larry and Leon get their phones mixed up, and Larry traumatizes the entire audience at Sammy's middle school production of Grease when he invites Jeff's exterminator to watch the show.

title: The TiVo Guy
desc: Cheryl is finally tired of Larry being Larry after her plane encounters severe turbulence and Larry seems more concerned about a malfunctioning TV device. After Cheryl announces that she's leaving Larry, the incident quickly splits up Larry's friends, who now have to break the news to Larry as to whose side they are taking.

title: The N Word
desc: Larry goes to the hospital to see his new girlfriend, an orthopedist. While in the bathroom, Larry overhears one end of a very angry, horribly offensive cell phone conversation. But repeating what the man said offends another doctor - the same one who is about to perform Jeff's operation. But it only results in Jeff's head getting shaved, who now has to deal with bein... Read all

title: The Therapists
desc: Larry devises an overly elaborate plan to win back Cheryl. He does so by trying to get on her therapist's good side. Meanwhile, Larry accuses Marty Funkhauser of taking charity money under false pretenses.

title: The Bat Mitzvah
desc: The Blacks learn some good news: they get to go home. As Larry says goodbye, he once again offends the wrong person, who takes his revenge on Larry by spreading a nasty rumor involving him and a gerbil. But thankfully Jeff's daughter's bat mitzvahs is coming up, and that provides Larry with the perfect, public opportunity to clear up that nasty rumor, as well as one m... Read all

title: Funkhouser's Crazy Sister
desc: Larry attempts a preemptive breakup with an ailing Loretta, and learns with Jeff that you can't make an "empty gesture" to a Funkhouser.

title: Vehicular Fellatio
desc: Larry deliberately tries to annoy Loretta, against the advice of a renowned doctor. Later, Larry dooms Richard Lewis' new relationship, and ends up profiting from Leon's indiscretion with the wife of a depressed pal.

title: The Reunion
desc: Approaching the 10-year mark, Larry and Jeff finally agree to do a Seinfeld reunion show. However, after getting a bad set of tickets to a Lakers game, he tries to call the reunion off after offending the head of NBC. Meanwhile Larry hatches a scheme to win back Cheryl by casting her as George's ex-wife.

title: The Hot Towel
desc: A series of bizarre events leads Larry to get his doctor's personal phone number, but how much will Larry's doctor regret it?

title: Denise Handicapped
desc: Larry embraces the upside of disability when he courts a handicap woman to take to a recital at a friend's house, but she doesn't return the favor when Suzie throws Larry's cell phone in the ocean and Larry loses her number in the process.

title: The Bare Midriff
desc: Larry inadvertently creates a miracle when he fires his assistant for exposing her waistline around the office. Jerry gets the idea to use Larry's latest mishap as part of the upcoming Seinfeld reunion show.

title: The Black Swan
desc: Larry is forced to cover his tracks after he accidentally causes the death of a country club member and kills the club's mascot in an act of self defense.

title: Officer Krupke
desc: While Cheryl competes for a role on the Seinfeld reunion, Larry is forced by Jeff to embrace his feminine side after a series of bizarre events leads Suzie to think he's having an affair.

title: The Table Read
desc: Rehearsals for the Seinfeld reunion show get complicated when Larry's text message exchange with a 9-year-old Seinfeld fan lands him in trouble with the local authorities. Meanwhile, Leon tries to fool Michael Richards.

title: Seinfeld
desc: Taping the Seinfeld reunion proves to be difficult after Larry's fight with a local coffee vendor alienates Jason Alexander and costs him quality time with Cheryl.

title: The Divorce
desc: Larry learns his lawyer isn't kosher, and rescinds a cookie order from the Girl Scout daughter of a beleaguered sports owner.

title: The Safe House
desc: Larry becomes an unlikely role model for battered women; Richard Lewis's relationship with a burlesque performer is put to the test; Leon survives a case of mistaken identity.

title: Palestinian Chicken
desc: Larry plays the ultimate "social assassin" at a dinner party, on the golf course, and at a Palestinian restaurant with phenomenal chicken.

title: The Smiley Face
desc: Larry vows to topple a sacred dating taboo, and regrets making concessions to his new office neighbor; Jeffʼs alibi to get out of a dinner backfires.

title: Vow of Silence
desc: A friend who has taken a vow of silence creates a stir at multiple parties, Larry eats Jeff's dog's last meal, and Richard Lewis is snubbed meeting Larry for lunch.

title: The Hero
desc: Larry accidentally becomes a hero on the flight to New York, earning him the respect of the woman sitting next to him, but it backfires when Jeff and Susie try to court Ricky Gervais.

title: The Bi-Sexual
desc: Larry and Rosie O'Donnell try to court the same woman. Larry takes Leon's advice, which gives him an advantage, but he finds it doesn't always work in the long run.

title: Car Periscope
desc: Larry and Jeff weigh an investment opportunity; Wanda Sykes preempts Larry's training schedule.

title: Mister Softee
desc: An ice-cream truck triggers a painful childhood memory for Larry that impacts a softball title game, a therapist's fees, Bill Buckner's legacy, and his new girlfriend's travel preferences.

title: Larry vs. Michael J. Fox
desc: Larry accuses his neighbor Michael J. Fox of harassment; Jeff takes a bullet for Susie; and Larry is scolded for giving an inappropriate birthday gift to Jennifer's son Greg.

title: Foisted!
desc: Larry tries to rid himself of an inept assistant, offends Jeff's barber, and gets into hot water over a new project.

title: The Pickle Gambit
desc: Larry reaches out to a familiar face, gives a hotel guest sartorial advice, and tries to create a diversion to help a friend's nephew.

title: A Disturbance in the Kitchen
desc: Larry turns to a writer for advice, and he gets ticketed by an overzealous cop while searching for Susie's "little sister."

title: Running with the Bulls
desc: Larry's therapist accuses him of overstepping doctor-patient bounds; Susie grows suspicious of Jeff; and Larry bribes an usher at a funeral.

title: Thank You for Your Service
desc: Larry fails to be suitably patriotic when meeting Jeff's future son-in-law; he also tries to reset his relationships with his mail carrier and security guard.

title: The Accidental Text on Purpose
desc: Larry invents an ingenious ploy for getting his friends out of relationship jams; he also upsets Funkhouser's new girlfriend.

title: Namaste
desc: Larry angers a hot yoga teacher, has an auspicious first date, and seethes over a run-in with an unfair Uber driver.

title: Never Wait for Seconds!
desc: Larry saves a line-cutter from an angry mob and deals with a tip-flipper.

title: The Shucker
desc: Larry is blackmailed by an employee and tormented by someone from his past; he and Jeff pitch a new creative venture.

title: Fatwa!
desc: On Jeff and Susie's daughter Sammi's wedding day, Larry has a scheduling conflict, takes issue with some work associates, and hosts a pair of ungrateful houseguests.

title: Happy New Year
desc: Larry kicks off the new year with new rival Mocha Joe; at a cocktail party hosted by Jeff and Susie, Larry gets roped into lunch plans and has a misunderstanding with a caterer.

title: Side Sitting
desc: Larry's lawyer tries to resolve the situation with his assistant, Alice; Larry surprises Susie with an impressive birthday gift and comes one step closer to exacting revenge on Mocha Joe.

title: Artificial Fruit
desc: Larry drops the ball when he gets the chance to make amends with his assistant Alice. Larry and Richard go to extreme lengths for their upcoming lunch date.

title: You're Not Going to Get Me to Say Anything Bad About Mickey
desc: Travel plans go awry when Larry brings an impromptu date to a destination wedding. At the hotel, Larry finds himself in a sticky situation when he goes searching for a toothbrush.

title: Insufficient Praise
desc: Larry receives a problematic gift from Freddy Funkhouser, causes trouble with Richard's new girlfriend, and offends one of Jeff's A-list clients.

title: The Surprise Party
desc: Susie is planning a surprise party for Jeff; and Larry makes an unlikely new friend.

title: The Ugly Section
desc: Larry attempts to capitalize on a friend's unexpected death, takes issue with a pattern of discrimination at a trendy restaurant, and offers his dermatologist's son a job; Richard has a suspiciously-good day on the golf course.

title: Elizabeth, Margaret and Larry
desc: A prominent actor shadows Larry to prepare for an upcoming role; Larry meddles in the sale of Cheryl's sister's house, helps Leon grow a new business, and stirs up trouble at a dinner party hosted by Richard's girlfriend.

title: Beep Panic
desc: Mocha Joe hatches a plan to sabotage his adversary. Larry develops a debilitating habit and takes pity on a waitress. Richard prepares for a career-defining role.

title: The Spite Store
desc: Larry runs into an unwelcome familiar face, seeks a second opinion on his knee injury and causes a rift between expectant parents.

title: The Five-Foot Fence
desc: While his latest venture is threatened by forces outside his control, Larry attends an unprecedented event at Albert Brooks' house.

title: Angel Muffin
desc: Larry is forced to attend an ill-fated work meeting and investigates the truth behind a faulty toilet. Determined to unravel a mystery of his own, Jeff employs Larry's detective skills.

title: The Mini Bar
desc: In a last-ditch effort, Larry enlists Cheryl's help with a project and, later, concocts a plan that could finally save his newest creative venture.

title: The Watermelon
desc: After agreeing to take Susie's new rabbi golfing, Larry then cashes in on her favor. Later, Larry's appeal to Woody Harrelson's animal rights activism comes with unexpected consequences.

title: IRASSHAIMASE!
desc: While he and his date swap secrets, Larry runs afoul of the rules and regulations at a sushi restaurant. No good deed goes unpunished for Freddy Funkhouser.

title: Man Fights Tiny Woman
desc: Larry navigates the complexities of requesting a new chauffeur, letting his roofer do his job, and imparting some constructive criticism to his chiropractor.

title: Irma Kostroski
desc: Ahead of Election Day, Larry befriends City Councilwoman Irma Kostroski while mediating a conflict between a difficult actor and his prop master.

title: What Have I Done?
desc: Larry does damage control to remain in Irma's good graces while encouraging Leon to monetize his knack for husbandly counsel.

title: Igor, Gregor, & Timor
desc: Larry seizes an opportunity to avoid Irma as he's roped into Jeff's latest apology tour.

title: The Mormon Advantage
desc: With the city council vote rapidly approaching, Larry gives some unsolicited marriage advice and hosts an event for an American hero.

title: Saikyô no otoko
desc: One Punch Man is too strong and growing tired of his weak enemies. Will he ever be faced with a real challenge?

title: Kokô no saibôgu
desc: Genos, a Cyborg who is seeking Justice fights with a Mosquito Monster along with Saitama.

title: Shûnen no kagakusha
desc: Saitama and Genos track down an evil scientist who wants to know the secret to Saitama's power.

title: Imadoki no ninja
desc: A group of Bald thugs use body armors to terrorize rich people. Sonic Speed, a hired ninja fights them. Unfortunately he meets with Saitama who is also a Bald.

title: Kyûkoku no shi
desc: Determined to get a little recognition, Saitama decides to become a pro hero, but first, he must pass the Hero Association tests and become a full-fledged member.

title: Saikyô no toshi
desc: To remain on the "Hero" list Saitama has to show some activity in every week. Currently the City Z is defined as the 'ghost town'. Heroes are gathered together to find out whats going on.

title: Shikô no deshi
desc: A giant meteor threatens to destroy City Z. All S-Rank heroes are called to City Z to destroy the meteor before its collision.

title: Shinkai no Ô
desc: Several Sea Folk appear and begin attacking citizens. They are easily defeated until The Deep Sea King appears and defeats many heroes including an S-Class.

title: Fukutsu no seigi
desc: The fight with the Deep Sea King concludes and Saitama and Genos reflect on it as well as Saitama's promotion to B-Class.

title: Katsute nai hodo no kiki
desc: Saitama and all class S heroes are gathered together to be informed of an imminent extremely danger threat.

title: Zen ushû no hasha
desc: An alien conqueror lands in a spaceship to conquer the Earth during the S class heroes meeting.

title: Saikyô no hîrô
desc: Saitama takes on the alien leader in epic battle as the S class heroes fight the alien warriors and destroy the spaceship.

title: A Super Serious Look Back!
desc: Learn the history of One-Punch Man, and get ready for season 2 with a super serious recap.

title: Return of the Hero
desc: Saitama and Genos are out shopping when they come across G4, a demonic robot on a mission to eliminate King. Meanwhile, Sitch attempts to recruit various assassins and villains.

title: Human Monster
desc: Garou issues a declaration of war on the Hero Association through terrifying means, Hellish Blizzard gives Saitama an ultimatum, and Genos decides to eliminate his master's stalker, Speed-o'.

title: The Hunt Begins
desc: Garou attacks the S-rank hero Tank top Master, his followers, and Mumen Rider. Garou continues his pursuit of attacking heroes. Saitama buys a wig to join a martial arts tournament after having a brief exchange with Garou.

title: Metal Bat
desc: Assigned to guard a VIP and his son, Metal Bat couldn't be less thrilled. But when the group is suddenly attacked all hell breaks loose. Meanwhile, Saitama has disguised himself as Charanko in order to enter the "Super Fight" martial arts tournament.

title: The Martial Arts Tournament
desc: Metal bat fights Garo. A lot of monsters surface around multiple cities and it is difficult for all the heroes to fight them. Meanwhile, Saitama is at the tournament and Genos is in the audience.

title: The Uprising of the Monsters
desc: Saitama continues facing opponents in the tournament. Genos receives a stress signal depicting that there are 5 monsters in City C and goes to kill them. Blizzard tries to fight a monster but she turns out be very strong.

title: Class S Heroes
